title: Did You Know Hollywood Cult Classic The Shawshank Redemption Performed Poorly During Its 1st Run?
text:
Movies have often tanked at the box office during initial release, but then have gone on to do well and become classics over time. Hollywood has seen some films like this, which today are considered masterpieces but were huge flops when they first hit the big screens. One such movie came out three decades back and failed to even make its budget. Today we consider it one of the best films ever made. It is hailed by many as the greatest piece of cinema created. Now that is coming a long way from not making a profit thirty years back. The film we speak of is The Shawshank Redemption. When it was released in 1994, it made just $18 million (Rs 1.8 crore) during its first run. The budget was $25 million (Rs 2.5 crore). That was close to a 30% loss. After being nominated for the Oscars, it was re-released in 1995. This time it grossed $73 million (Rs 7.3 crore) which was roughly three times its budget.
But the real popularity came thanks to reruns on TV and word of mouth. It became a cult classic in Hollywood and was ranked pretty high on IMDb’s top 250 list. Its IMDb rating of 9.3 is the highest any movie has gotten till done.
The Shawshank Redemption stars Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman in pivotal roles. The story is about a man wrongfully convicted of murder who slowly makes peace with himself while in prison. He eventually escapes and tells his friend where to meet him once he gets out.
The movie shows a lot about life inside prison and the difficulty for many convicts to adjust to life outside once they are released. Over the years, the film has won hearts and is recommended by people more often than not. Come 2024, it will also be available on OTT.
Many, in fact, believe that the reason it did not do well initially was because people had a hard time remembering the name. To be fair, it does not come smoothly off the tongue. But now the name is one people will never forget.
If you have seen it, good for you, if you have not, what are you waiting for? The movie appeals to the hearts and minds of people of all ages. The odds of not liking this film are minimal and while it is a bit slow, the plot is such that you stay captivated from start to finish.
summary: The Shawshank Redemption stars Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman in pivotal roles.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Rohit Shetty On Hardik Pandya’s Dramatic Comeback: ‘It’s Like Watching A Movie'
text:
Rohit Shetty, the mastermind behind Singham Again, sees an epic story arc in Indian cricket player Hardik Pandya’s journey over the past year. Comparing it to the twists and turns of a film, Shetty feels Pandya’s last 12 months would make a gripping cinematic story. From setbacks to stunning comebacks, Hardik Pandya’s tale has all the ingredients of a classic protagonist’s rise against the odds. On Ranveer Allahbadia’s YouTube show, filmmaker Rohit Shetty, talked about Pandya’s emotional rollercoaster, viewing it through the lens of a storyteller.
“Hardik’s last year was nothing short of cinematic,” Shetty said, describing the narrative of being booed only to later bring the nation a win, and return to applause. “It’s like watching a movie—where the hero falls, even as 10,000-20,000 people are jeering. And then, when he comes back to the same stadium, they cheer, and he’s crying. That’s real cinema,” Rohit Shetty, 50, said.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Ranveer Allahbadia (@ranveerallahbadia)

Hardik Pandya was appointed captain of the Mumbai Indians (MI) for IPL 2024. He took over from Rohit Sharma, who led the team for a decade. But fans were not thrilled. When he walked out on the Wankhede pitch, MI’s loyal supporters made their displeasure clear with loud boos. The season didn’t go as hoped, with Mumbai finishing at the bottom of the rankings. Battling immense pressure, Pandya found himself struggling with both bat and ball.
But fast-forward to the 2024 T20 World Cup celebration at Wankhede, and it was a completely different scene. The same crowd that had once jeered now cheered loudly for Hardik Pandya, who had played a vital role in Team India’s T20 World Cup victory, even bowling the last nerve-wracking over against South Africa. Overwhelmed, Hardik Pandya couldn’t hold back his tears and videos of the moment had gone viral on social media.

Nothing but massive respect for you, @HardikPandya7! 🫡??
After his recent setbacks, 'Kung fu Pandya' narrates how his unwavering spirit, hard work & belief led to his comeback in the #T20WorldCup! ?
Tune in to watch the entire celebrations, all day long, TODAY, only on Star… pic.twitter.com/lwxAowAD1A
— Star Sports (@StarSportsIndia) June 29, 2024

Meanwhile, for Rohit Shetty himself too, this year has brought success as his directorial Singham Again has been pulling huge crowds to theatres. Since its Diwali release, the film’s box office collections have reportedly crossed the 200 crore mark. When Ranveer asked Rohit Shetty how he felt about the movie’s success and his plans for the earnings, the director said, “Yes, we are happy, but our minds have already switched on to work mode.
 Asked if he’d thrown a big celebration, Rohit Shetty laughed, saying, “I don’t think we even get out of the house if not for work or family. That is our chill.”
The director also hinted at his plans to work on sequels of his comedy films like Golmaal and All the Best.
summary: On Ranveer Allahbadia’s YouTube channel, filmmaker Rohit Shetty, talked about Hardik Pandya’s emotional rollercoaster, viewing it through the lens of a storyteller.
author: Dishya Sharma,News18,Sahas

title: Raghav Chadha celebrates birthday in Varanasi with wife Parineeti Chopra
text:
Varanasi, Nov 11 (IANS) AAP Rajya Sabha member Raghav Chadha, celebrated his birthday this year in Varanasi – the spiritual and cultural heart of India. 

Accompanied by his wife, Bollywood actress Parineeti Chopra, Chadha participated in the revered Ganga Aarti at the historic Dashashwamedh Ghat, seeking blessings from Maa Ganga for the year ahead.

Chadha, visibly emotional after the ritual, said that the occasion was deeply moving for him.

Earlier, the couple received a warm welcome from the Ganga Seva Nidhi members.

Chadha’s other family members were also present on the occasion. The video of their participating in the Ganga Aarti is getting viral on social media.

Reflecting on the experience, the MP remarked: “Gange tav darshanat mukti”, adding, “I began the new year of my life by receiving blessings at the feet of Moksha Daayini (the bestower of liberation), Patit Paavani Maa Ganga. My prayers were for the prosperity and happiness of our country.”

The evening Aarti left a profound impact on the politician. Describing the atmosphere, he shared, “The divine experience here is nothing short of amazing, spiritual, and almost transcendental. Being in Kashi, I am filled with happiness, cheer, and an overwhelming sense of energy. Har Har Gange!”

The Ganga Aarti, with its majestic flames, rhythmic chants, and the serene flow of the revered river, provided an auspicious backdrop for the birthday celebrations. For Chadha, it was not merely a religious ceremony but a deeply spiritual start to another year of his journey in public life.

Chadha and Chopra got married on September 24 last year at the Leela Palace Hotel in Udaipur, Rajasthan. Their wedding was attended by several celebrities from the world of entertainment and politics.

Chadha was born on November 11, 1987, and is a member of the Aam Aadmi Party.

Accompanied by his wife, Bollywood actress Parineeti Chopra, Chadha participated in the revered Ganga Aarti at the historic Dashashwamedh Ghat, seeking blessings from Maa Ganga for the year ahead. title: Yellowstone Season 5 Episode 9: Is Kevin Costner’s Character John Dutton Dead? Here's What to Expect Next
text:
Spoiler Alert: This article contains spoilers for Yellowstone Season 5 Episode 9. 

While all the heartbeats of the Yellowstone fans were tumbling to notice what the series would do with the character of Kevin Costner, the show had a sort of peculiar way to handle it. 

It was clear that Costner is not returning to the series following his box office hit Horizon. However, his character of John Dutton being the iconic patriarch of the series, eyes were still wide open to figure out the character's journey ahead. 

As soon as the first episode of the second half of Season 5 aired, everything was revealed, breaking the hearts of thousands. 

In the latest episode of Yellowstone, the audience learned that the Dutton family patriarch, John, was killed following a fatal gunshot wound. 

While the incident takes place in the bathroom of the Montana governor’s mansion, mystery still surrounds the Dutton family, as the death of John Dutton is stated to be a suicide. 

Meanwhile, though the series confirmed that Dutton’s character has died, showing the bloodied body of an old man, Kevin Costner’s face was nowhere to be seen. 

The episode also shows that John’s children Beth and Layce, played by Kelly Reilly and Luke Grimes, respectively, race over as their father gets late to the first day of his impeachment tribunal.

While Beth blames John’s death on her brother, an opportunistic son, Jamie, played by Wes Bentley, Kayce still does not believe that Jamie would have anything to do with the death. 

In the latest episode, we also learn that Sarah Atwood, who happens to be the market Equities consultant and the one who had been out to topple John’s governorship, had hired a contract killer to stage the death as a suicide. This is shown through a flashback.
n17AZkUXy58Kevin Costner has been a part of the Yellowstone family since the inception of this series. 

However, rumors surfaced that Costner would depart from the show, as the actor was worried that Yellowstone would step in between his schedule of filming his Horizon movie series. 

While the speculations had come up after the first half of Season 5 aired in February 2023, Kevin Costner confirmed that he won't be making a return to the show by June this year. 

The first installment of Horizon was released on June 28, 2024.
ALSO READ: Kevin Costner's Horizon Struggles At Box Office But Filmmaker Remains Committed To Vision: Future Of The Four-Part Franchise In Jeopardy?
summary:
Kevin Costner has been a part of the Yellowstone family since the inception of this series. 



However, rumors surfaced that Costner would depart from the show, as the actor was worried that Yellowstone would step in between his schedule of filming his Horizon movie series. 



While the speculations had come up after the first half of Season 5 aired in February 2023, Kevin Costner confirmed that he won't be making a return to the show by June this year. 



The first installment of Horizon was released on June 28, 2024.
author: Tejas Mundhada

title: Taylor Swift Takes Center Stage at 2024 MTV Europe Music Awards
text: It was a big night for the pop idol Taylor Swift who emerged with four major accolades including Best Artist at the MTV Europe Music Awards held in Manchester, England. The pop star leading the entire pack had seven accolades to her name but managed to win Best Live Act, Best US Act, Best Video with Post Malone for the song Fortnight and Best Artist. Taylor has been recently performing her Eras Tour in N. America sent a video message thanking her fans, saying: “The fact that you have honored the tour, everything that’s happened with the album this year, the video, it’s just unbelievable.” Earlier this April, the singer released her album The Tortured Poets Department which was her last album.The award ceremonies took off in style after the fracas in Gaza had led to the cancellation of last year’s ceremony that had been held in Paris. The event was held at the Manchester’s Co-Op Live venue and included several touching moments including the fact that former One Direction member Liam Payne who unfortunately died last month was paid tributes. Rita Ora has hosted the awards for 3 times now and in this particular case was the first person to pay tribute to Liam. Tearfully she stated “He was one of the guys who belonged in the MTV and mine in even MTV was where he had the biggest impact, bless him.”Other notable winners of the evening included Sabrina Carpenter, who won Best Song for "Espresso," Ariana Grande, who took home Best Pop, and Eminem, who won Best Hip-Hop. BTS member Jimin claimed Best K-Pop, Peso Pluma won Best Latin, Manchester native Liam Gallagher secured Best Rock, and Benson Boone took home Best New Act.To top it all off, they close the night with a special medley highlight, which is also what Busta Rhymes sung which made him recipient of the Global Icon Award. The highlight of the night can be credited Pioneers awarded Pop that were also for bitten Pet Shop Boys and turned the night with Bang.
author: Bhavana Sharma

title: Zameer Ahmed’s ‘kaliya’ remark on HD Kumaraswamy sparks outrage
text: BENGALURU: Karnataka minister BZ Zameer Ahmed Khan stirred a controversy with an alleged racial slur against former chief minister HD Kumaraswamy, calling him “Kaliya”. Speaking at a campaign rally on Sunday, Khan stated, “Kaliya Kumaraswamy is more dangerous than the BJP,” a comment that drew severe backlash from Khan's political opponents.The Janata Dal (Secular) [JDS] launched a scathing response, calling for Khan’s dismissal from his ministerial role. Posting on X, the JDS questioned whether Congress would use similar language for other prominent party leaders.— JanataDal_S (@JanataDal_S) “What is the colour of Shri Mallikarjun Kharge, who is a Kannadiga? What is the colour of Priyank Kharge? What is the colour of D K Suresh?” the JDS posted.“What difference does it make if a person’s skin is black or white? Such a low-minded person like @BZZameerAhmedK should be immediately removed from the @INCIndia, @INCKarnataka, and @siddaramaiah cabinet.”The party’s post continued, “The people of the state will give a fitting response to your words of disrespect and your negative mindset towards people of darker skin colour.”The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) also condemned Khan’s remark, with party national spokesperson Shehzad Poonawalla accusing Congress of fostering divisions.“Congress minister Zameer Ahmad calls HD Kumaraswamy as ‘Kaliya’. This is nafrat ki dukan. First Congress divided on caste, and now on race, like Sam Pitroda did. Sam was given a promotion by Rahul for calling South Indians Africans, and now Rahul will promote Zameer too,” Poonawalla said.
summary: Karnataka minister B Z Zameer Ahmed Khan sparked outrage by referring to former CM H D Kumaraswamy as "Kaliya" (black-coloured) at a rally. The JDS condemned the racial slur, demanding Khan's removal from the cabinet and criticizing Congress for potential hypocrisy.
author: TNN

title: Kundali Bhagya's Ruhi Chaturvedi Announces Pregnancy On Husband Shivendraa's Birthday With A Warm Video
text:
Best known for essaying the role of Sherlyn Khurana in Kundali Bhagya, Ruhi Chaturvedi is expecting her first child. The popular television actress took to her social media to announce that she is all set to welcome her first child with her husband, Shivendraa Saainiyol.

The video showed Shivendraa going on his knees as Ruhi turned towards him. Shivendraa was seen shirtless at the pool, while Ruhi wore a bikini top which she had paired with a pink shirt. As she turned and flaunted her baby bump, her husband placed a kiss on her stomach. Sharing the video, she wrote, “Our beautiful family is getting a little bigger and a lot more wonderful 11:11… Happy birthday my best friend @shivendraa_om_saainiyol.”
Take a look at the video here.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Ruhi Chaturvedi (@ruhiiiiiiiiii)

The video has gone viral on social media and fans took to the comment section to congratulate the actor as she embarks on this new journey in her life. Along with fans, her Kundali Bhagya co-star Shraddha Arya also commented on the post. She wrote, “’Wowwww, I had an inkling… Best News on the internet today… Lots Of Love And Luck to The New Parents to Be.” Arya is also expecting her baby soon. Celebrities like Adhvik Mahajan, Shakti Arora, Supriya Shukla, Mansi Shrivastava, Sehban Azim, and Pooja Banerjee also left warm messages for the couple in the comment section.
Ruhi and Shivendraa had tied the knot in December 2019. They tied the knot after dating each other for a long time. The intimate wedding was attended by their close friends and family. Apart from Kundali Bhagya, the actor was also seen in Khatron Ke Khiladi 13. On the other hand, Shivendraa has been a part of Nimrit Kaur Ahluwalia’s popular serial, Choti Sardarni.
summary: Ruhi Chaturvedi took to her social media to announce her pregnancy on husband Shivendraa's birthday. She was congratulated by her Kundali Bhagya co-star Shraddha Arya in the comments.

title: Cher Shares Shocking Memoir Details of A 'Stark Naked' John Lennon, Divorce Drama, and Hollywood Sexism; Says 'It Was Like Herdering Drunks'
text:
Cher’s latest memoir offers a revealing look into her life, including wild celebrity encounters and a raw, often challenging journey through fame, love, and industry hardships. Known for her resilience and independence, Cher shares anecdotes that provide fans with an intimate view of her life as a Hollywood legend navigating unforgettable events.

In Cher: The Memoir, the pop icon recounts an incident from 1974, when she encountered John Lennon and his friend Harry Nilsson in a Los Angeles restaurant. Spontaneously, she invited them to the Playboy Mansion, only to discover that the duo had been drinking heavily. As the night unfolded, Lennon and Nilsson began calling out to Hugh Hefner in exaggerated accents and causing a stir. Trying to keep them out of trouble, Cher led them to the mansion’s grotto, which she describes as a cave-like hideaway that connects to the pool.

Upon returning with drinks, Cher was surprised to find Lennon and Nilsson standing naked in the water, laughing and seemingly unbothered by their lack of clothing. She humorously recalls the challenge of getting them back into their clothes, likening it to “herding drunks.” The incident, while lighthearted in hindsight, highlights the unpredictability of celebrity interactions in the lavish setting of the Playboy Mansion. Cher reveals that her daughter Chastity, now Chaz Bono, often visited Hefner’s mansion as a child and even received a life-sized lion statue as a gift from Hefner.

Alongside these unforgettable stories, Cher’s memoir also delves into deeper aspects of her life, addressing her publicized divorces and struggles against sexism in Hollywood. As a pioneering woman in entertainment, Cher often encountered resistance and scrutiny, which only strengthened her resolve. Her accounts shed light on the toll of balancing personal life and career while constantly facing societal expectations.

Cher’s memoir is a heartfelt reflection of her resilience and the journey that led her to become a global icon. Through candid stories and touching memories, she invites readers to witness both the joys and hardships of her life, showcasing her enduring spirit and passion. This memoir not only celebrates Cher’s unique life but also inspires fans by capturing the wisdom and strength of a star who’s never been afraid to stand on her own.

summary:

She humorously recalls the challenge of getting them back into their clothes, likening it to “herding drunks.” The incident, while lighthearted in hindsight, highlights the unpredictability of celebrity interactions in the lavish setting of the Playboy Mansion. Cher reveals that her daughter Chastity, now Chaz Bono, often visited Hefner’s mansion as a child and even received a life-sized lion statue as a gift from Hefner.



Alongside these unforgettable stories, Cher’s memoir also delves into deeper aspects of her life, addressing her publicized divorces and struggles against sexism in Hollywood. title: Meghan Markle ‘Copyrighted’ Lilibet Name Before Birth, Royal Expert Claims
text: New Delhi, India: A royal expert has revealed that Meghan Markle allegedly “copyrighted” the name Lilibet before the birth of her daughter, a move that has sparked further controversy. The bombshell claim comes amid allegations that Queen Elizabeth II was deeply angered when Prince Harry and Meghan announced they had been given the late monarch’s permission to name their daughter after her childhood nickname. Lilibet, a nickname that was used affectionately by the Queen’s family, originated when she struggled to pronounce her own name as a child, and was later adopted by her family, including her grandfather, King George V. However, according to royal author Robert Hardman, writing in Charles III: New King, New Court, the Queen was reportedly furious when Harry and Meghan revealed that they had sought her blessing to use the name for their daughter. According to an insider the Queen was “as angry as I’ve ever seen her” after hearing of the Sussexes’ announcement. Though the couple reportedly consulted the monarch, they did not seek formal permission to use the name, a claim later backed by the foreign media, which quoted a Palace source stating that the name had been used without official consent. Everything you need to know about the copyright controversy Angela Levin, a royal biographer and critic of the Sussexes, took the controversy a step further, claiming that Meghan had gone to the lengths of copyrighting the name Lilibet before her daughter's birth. Speaking on the matter, Levin described the couple’s actions as “appalling,” adding that the Queen had been left “furious” over the situation. When asked by presenter Eamonn Holmes whether Meghan had copyrighted the name, Levin confirmed, saying, “Yes,” suggesting that Meghan had taken legal steps to protect the name for personal use, including for business purposes. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex's spokesperson had previously maintained that they received confirmation from the Queen regarding the name. However, when the BBC and other outlets reported that the Queen had not granted formal permission, the Sussexes’ lawyers sent legal letters disputing the claim and accusing the media of defamation. The naming of Lilibet has become a symbol of the growing rift between Harry, Meghan, and the rest of the royal family. Following the birth of their daughter in California on June 4, 2021, the Sussexes were quick to announce the name, which some saw as a gesture of homage to the late Queen. However, the lack of clarity surrounding whether the Queen had given her blessing, and the subsequent revelation about the copyright, has only added fuel to the ongoing royal drama. According to Hardman’s account, the Queen was deeply hurt by the use of her childhood nickname in such a public manner, telling aides that while she did not "own the palaces or the paintings," her name was one thing that was entirely hers. "And now they’ve taken that," she was reportedly quoted as saying.
summary: Meghan Markle ‘Copyrighted’ Lilibet Name Before Birth, Royal Expert Claims
author: Digital Desk

title: Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives’ Shalini Passi reveals her dream role in acting and it has a connection with Sunny Deol; Can you guess?
text:
Shalini Passi, known for her style, demeanor, wit, lifestyle, charm, beauty, and more, has won the hearts of fans on Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives. Along with her talents in singing, dancing, and painting, fans are curious to know if she plans to venture into acting. In a recent interview, she revealed her dream acting role 'a dramatic part in a Partition-era film, similar to Sunny Deol's Gadar and Gadar 2'. 

In a recent interview with Entertainment Live, Shalini Passi was asked about her dream acting role. She mentioned that, as of now, she doesn't have any specific plans for acting. She explained that acting requires proper learning and a lot of effort from people. 

Ask if she is thinking to do something more, Passi said, "Well, one show happened, and some offers came in. Offers keep coming, but the thing is, if I had a dream role, it would be something set during the Partition. You know, like a black-and-white film. If something like that comes up, I would work hard and learn for it."

When asked if she was interested in doing traditional romantic roles, Passi replied that she was not interested in that genre. She shared that she is drawn to the World War I and World War II eras, particularly the 1940s and 1950s, as it feels special to her.

She expressed a deep interest in the freedom movement in India during that time, describing it as a fantasy she’s had since childhood. Passi mentioned her desire to play a role or portray an artist from that era in a film, adding that everything would unfold in its own time.

Shalini joined the latest season of Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives on Netflix in Delhi cast, alongside Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, Ranbir Kapoor's sister, and Kalyani Chawla, offering a fresh perspective to the show.

At 49, Passi has become a notable figure on social media, celebrated for her bold and extravagant personality, which goes beyond her eye-catching fashion choices. She has become an advocate for self-love, emphasizing her belief that holding onto grudges can negatively affect her skin.

The third season of Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives, now renamed Fabulous Lives Vs Bollywood Wives, is currently streaming on Netflix.

In a recent interview with Entertainment Live, Shalini Passi was asked about her dream acting role. She mentioned that, as of now, she doesn't have any specific plans for acting. She explained that acting requires proper learning and a lot of effort from people. 



Ask if she is thinking to do something more, Passi said, "Well, one show happened, and some offers came in. Offers keep coming, but the thing is, if I had a dream role, it would be something set during the Partition. You know, like a black-and-white film. If something like that comes up, I would work hard and learn

title: Leonardo DiCaprio's 50th Birthday: Brad Pitt, Katy Perry, Paris Hilton, Others Attend Midnight Bash
text:
Hollywood star Leonardo DiCaprio turned 50 today, ie, on November 11. In order to celebrate the occasion, he hosted a grand birthday bash at his home in Los Angeles. The star-studded party included Brad Pitt to Katy Perry to Paris Hilton. The pictures from the birthday party is now going viral on social media.Star-studded party of Leonardo DiCaprioThe Titanic star celebrated his birthday a day before, ie on November 9 at his house. Several pictures from the occasion is now going viral on social media. Celebrities including Brad Pitt, Katy Perry, Tobey Maguire, Cara Delevingne, Paris Hilton, and Jamie Foxx were among some of the attendees. View this post on Instagram A post shared by curators of pop culture (@deuxmoi)
According to several reports, in the party, his parents and his close friends were also there at the party. Reports suggest that Anderson Park was the DJ for the night and the party continued till the next day.File photo of Paris Hilton | Source: InstagramAs soon as the pictures went viral, fans took to comment section to wish the actor also cheekily commented saying its an age-appropriate party. One user wrote, “Omg shocked at this age appropriate crowd”. Another user wrote, “famous people be getting old”. “Lol everyone looks so regular in the face, it’s crazy how not hot they are when they’re not in front of a movie camera, including Brad Pitt”.File photo of Brad Pitt with girlfriend Ines de Ramon | Source: InstagramWhen Leonardo DiCaprio admitted of wanting to be father before birthdayAccording to a report in The Sun, Leonardo has revealed that he wants to embrace fatherhood. I am sure it will be, but it’s true I am not getting any younger”.File photo of Leonardo Di Caprio | Source: XHollywood heartthrob Leonardo DiCaprio and model Vittoria Ceretti who are currently dating have not yet taken the plunge of saying ‘I do’. title: Chunky Panday Takes A Dig At Ananya Panday, Aditya Roy Kapur's Failed Relationship? See Here
text:
Chunky Panday has seemingly taken a dig at Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur’s ended romance. Chunky Panday ‘liked’ a post on social media that threw shade at Ananya and Aditya’s contract for an eyewear brand lasting beyond their relationship. Chunky Panday has left the internet in splits.
A meme recently went viral on social media after Chunky Panday allegedly ‘liked’ it. The post read, “When the brand’s contract lasts longer than the relationship.” The image featured Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur promoting an eyewear brand. Check out the viral post here:
Chunky Panday throwing shade at Aditya-Ananya relationship 
byu/Cautiousoptimist909 inBollyBlindsNGossip

Ananya and Aditya reportedly dated for nearly two years before calling it quits. Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur’s breakup rumours made headlines in April after the actress shared a cryptic note on her Instagram stories which read, “If it is truly meant for you, it will come back to you. It will leave only for the sake of teaching you the lessons you could only learn on your own. If it is truly meant for you, it will return even if you’ve pushed it away, even if you’re in denial, even if you assume something so beautiful could never be truly yours – because if it’s truly meant for you, it is never not a piece of you. It is never not intricately tied into the depths of your soul.”
Later, a close friend of the two actors told the Bombay Times, “They broke up almost a month ago. They were going quite well, and the breakup came as a shock to all of us. They are cordial with each other. Ananya is trying to move on; of course, there’s hurt. She is spending time with her new furry friend. Aditya is also trying to deal with the situation maturely.”
However, it should also be noted that Ananya and Aditya have not reacted to their breakup rumours. They also never explicitly spoke about their relationship either. After their breakup, Ananya and Aditya continued to fulfil their brand commitments and Aditya even featured in a beverage ad with Chunky, leaving the internet divided.
summary: Chunky Panday seemingly mocked Ananya and Aditya's collaboration for an eyewear brand.

title: When Abhishek Bachchan Defended Aishwarya Rai Amid Actress Being Labelled 'Plastic': As A Husband...
text: Abhishek Bachchan-Aishwarya Rai: The couple has been in the headlines for a few months due to reports regarding turbulence in their marriage. However, there has been no confirmation about the same from either actor. While Abhishek Bachchan is gearing up for the release of his film I Want To Talk, an old interview of him defending his wife has now surfaced online.When Abhishek Bachchan defended his wife Aishwarya Rai Amid news of trouble in their relationship, several old interviews and videos of both Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan have resurfaced online. In one such interview, the Paa actor can be seen playing an advocate for the actress when she is subjected to criticism regarding her appearance. A file photo of Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai | Image: IMDbResponding to reports of Aishwarya Rai being labelled as 'plastic', Abhishek Bachchan commented, 'not as her husband but her co-star', "She happens to have done some of the most daring kind of roles, that an actor, who’s basically meant to have been known only for her beauty, could have done." He then went on to name films like Chokher Bali (2003), Raincoat (2004), and Mani Ratnam’s Guru (2007), to prove his point.When Aishwarya Rai revealed if she fights with Abhishek Bachchan As rumours around their marriage gain strength, an old video of Aishwarya Rai has also surfaced online. Time is precious for us, so we have our little dramatics all day very quickly.”A file photo of Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai | Image: IMDbShe also clarified that the relationship they share is based on 'friendship'. Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan tied the knot in April 2007. The actors are parents to Aaradhaya Bachchan.

title: Inside Sreejita De And Michael Blohm-Pape's Dreamy Mehndi At Goa Wedding
text:
Actress Sreejita De and Blohm-Pape hosted a Bengali wedding in Goa, a year after tying the knot in a Catholic ceremony in Germany last year. Before the wedding, the couple also celebrated several pre-wedding ceremonies including mehendi, haldi and sangeet. 
Sharing glimpses of the wedding ceremonies, the actress dropped photos from her Mehndi on Instagram. 
Sreejita looked stunning in a sparkling gold sequin top and a colourful, colour-blocked drape skirt, teamed with a trendy biker-style jacket. On the other hand, Michael was dressed in an ivory Indo-western suit, which he topped off with a stunning, multicoloured designer jacket. While the couple posed together in most of the pictures, a solo picture of the actress showed her hand clad in mehendi.
In the caption, she wrote, “A story that our children will tell their children… Of love, togetherness and beyond this world!! #AlwaysForever…Some from our mehendi ceremony…” 

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sreejita De Blohm-Pape (@sreejita_de)

As per a report by Etimes, the couple tied the knot in a traditional Bengali ceremony in Goa on November 10. Speaking about why they chose Goa, the actress told the publication, “We spent almost eight months together in Goa during the lockdown. We realised we didn’t need to go out or do anything elaborate to be happy we were content just being together. Michael loves the Goan vibe, the food, the lifestyle, and we’re both beach people, so a beach wedding felt perfect.”
Sharing about why it was important for them to get married in both Catholic and Bengali customs, Sreejita noted, “We wanted to honour and respect both of our backgrounds. Having already created wonderful memories with our German wedding, we’re now excited to relive those emotions through a Bengali wedding.”

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sreejita De Blohm-Pape (@sreejita_de)

Sreejita De and Michael Blohm Pape married in July 2023 after dating for around five years. Michael proposed marriage to Sreejita in Paris in 2021. 
Sreejita De rose to fame with her stint on Bigg Boss 16. She has also been part of several successful TV shows such as Uttaran Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka!, Tum Hi Ho Bandhu Sakha Tumhi, Piya Rangrezz.
summary: Sreejita De and Michael Blohm Pape married in July 2023 after dating for around five years.

title: GloRilla Shares Her Reaction To Taylor Swift Hyping Her Song: 'I Was Tweaking'
text:

GloRilla couldn’t contain her excitement when she saw Swift featuring her track in a video, and it wasn’t long before Sexyy Red also shared the moment, reposting the video on X.
The video in question shows Taylor Swift with Olivia, her pet cat, walking through an empty Hard Rock Stadium in Miami. “Back in the office,” she wrote in the caption, teasing her upcoming tour. title: 'Not my job to...' : Meghan Markle's seven-word response when confronted over bullying
text: Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex gave a very blunt seven-word response when a senior aide confronted her about not being well-liked by palace staff, according to Royal biographer Robert Lacey.In his book 'Battle of the Brothers', Robert Lacey alleged that the Duchess would raise her voice at staff members, "humiliated staff in meetings", and "govern by fear."A palace courtier was quoted saying in the book that: "Meghan governed by fear. So many people said it. Nothing was ever good enough for her."Reports indicate that a senior aide confronted Meghan about her behavior, noting that it was causing difficulties for the staff. Meghan allegedly responded with a seven-word retort: "It's not my job to coddle people."These allegations came to light as early as 2017, during the Sussexes' engagement. In October 2018, Jason Knauf, who previously served as communications secretary for the Cambridges and Sussexes, sent an email containing serious bullying allegations against Meghan.Knauf indicated he had obtained numerous accounts from individuals who had observed "unacceptable behaviour" by Meghan directed at a staff member, OK Magazine UK reported. The former television actress strongly refuted these claims.Meghan's closest friends and former acting colleagues also refused these claims, insisting they do not align with the "kind" person they know and love.A friend of the Suit actress told Bazaar.com: "I hate to say it, but find me a woman of color in a senior position who has not been accused of being too angry, too scary... in the workplace.""Let's just call this what it is - a calculated smear campaign based on misleading and harmful misinformation. We are disappointed to see this defamatory portrayal of the Duchess of Sussex given credibility by a media outlet, a spokesperson for Meghan and Harry said The Mirror US reported."It's no coincidence that distorted several year old accusations aimed at undermining the duchess are being briefed to the British media shortly before she and the duke are due to speak openly and honestly about their experience of recent years,” the spokesperson added.Jessica Mulroney, who shares a close relationship with Meghan took to social media and said: "I don't know that anyone has ever had to deal with the pressure, the politics and the press like this woman. In the face of it all, I have never seen her waver from kindness, empathy, and love."Robert, who serves as a historical consultant for Netflix's The Crown, has chronicled various conflicts within the Royal household in his publication, with details accounting back to 2017, documenting numerous instances of internal tensions.
summary: Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex, allegedly faced accusations of harsh treatment towards palace staff, as claimed by royal biographer Robert Lacey.  Lacey's book reveals allegations of Meghan's demanding behavior and a tense work environment.  Meghan refuted these claims, suggesting they were part of a smear campaign, while her friends defended her character.
author: Toi World Desk

title: BLACKPINK Lisa Makes Acting Debut In HBO's The White Lotus Season 3, Teaser Out | Watch
text:
Blackpink’s Lisa is currently making headlines for her performance at an award show or be it her funny antics. Lisa is a Thai rapper, singer and dancer. She is a member of the South Korean girl group Blackpink, which made its debut under YG Entertainment in August 16. Now after gaining success in singing career, she is all set to make her acting debut.Blackpink’s Lisa to make debut in series?The makers have dropped the teaser of the upcoming series The White Lotus Season 3. The teaser begins with the focus on a life sized Bronze statue in Thailand which sets the journey. As the camera pans towards the stunning views and landscapes, soon Blackpink’s Lisa pops up. She is dressed in a white uniform as a resort manager with her hair neatly tied in a bun and she is seen greeting the guests with a friendly smile on her face. In the show, her name is Mook, which in Thai means white pearl. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Max (@streamonmax)
As soon as the video was dropped, fans got excited and fans flooded the comment section. One user wrote, “Lisa from Blackpink is making her acting debut in the third season of HBO's The White Lotus and we can't wait! Born in Thailand, where this season is set.” Another user wrote, “Lisa looks amazing here”. “She is representing Thailand”, wrote the third user.File photo of Lisa in The White Lotus Season 3 | Source: XThe White Lotus 3 will mark Lisa’s acting debut in Hollywood. She is currently Blackpink's second member to make an appearance in an HBO series. In June 2023, Jennie (credited as Jennie Ruby Jane) debuted as an actor in the drama The Idol. All about The White LotusThe first season of the Emmy-winning series The White Lotus was launched in July 2021. It featured Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Jennifer Coolidge, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Lacy, Natasha Rothwell, and Steve Zahn. The satirical comedy-drama series follows the lives of the staff and guests at the White Lotus, a tropical resort in Hawaii.File photo of The White Lotus | Source: InstagramThe second season premiered on October 30. Created, written, and directed by Mike White, it is set at an exclusive Sicilian resort and follows the exploits of various guests and employees over a week. Initially set up as a limited series, the show was expanded for a sophomore run following rave reviews and an overwhelming response from the audience.
summary: BLACKPINK Lisa Makes Acting Debut In HBO's The White Lotus Season 3, Teaser Out | Watch
author: Republic Entertainment Desk

title: Khushi Kapoor Confirms Dating Vedang Raina By Wearing Bracelet With His Name? See Here
text:
Has Khushi Kapoor made her relationship official with Vedang Raina? This question is on everyone’s mind after fans spotted Khushi wearing a bracelet with Vedang’s name on it in her tropical vacation photo dump. However, it is unclear in the photo whether Khushi’s bracelet spells out Vedang’s name.
Fans suspect that Khushi Kapoor has made her relationship official with Vedang Raina by wearing a bracelet that spelt out his name. Interestingly, Janhvi Kapoor also made her relationship with Shikhar Pahariya official by wearing a necklace with his name on it.
Check out Khushi’s photos here:

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by ᴋʜᴜsʜɪ ᴋᴀᴘᴏᴏʀ (@khushikapoor)

Rumours of Khushi Kapoor and Vedang Raina’s alleged relationship have been floating on social media ever since they starred in Zoya Akhtar’s film The Archies. While the pair has neither confirmed nor denied the speculations, they are often spotted together on various occasions. Recently, eagle-eyed fans noticed similarities in Khushi and Vedang’s vacation pictures. The two did not post pictures of each other on their Instagram accounts, but the similar background of their posts made people believe that they were vacationing together.
Earlier this year, Khushi Kapoor addressed her dating rumours with Vedang Raina in an interaction with Karan Johar on his chat show Koffee With Karan. When the filmmaker confronted her saying, “Conjecture goes that you are dating Vedang Raina,” she responded with a witty answer. Khushi told him, “You know that scene in Om Shanti Om where there’s a row of people just saying, ‘Om and I were just good friends’?”
However, in August, Vedang said in a chat with GQ that he had kept his dating life on the back burner to focus on his career. Vedang Raina told GQ, “My dating life right now is taking a back seat because I’m focused on my career. I’m clear about my priorities and want to keep these two aspects of my life separate. I’m enjoying where I am, and there’s a lot more I want to achieve. It’s not that dating would necessarily hinder me, but it can become a major part of your life. So I’m choosing to stay mindful of that and concentrate on what’s most important.”
Meanwhile, on their work fronts, Vedang Raina was most recently seen opposite Alia Bhatt in the film Jigra. Whereas his rumoured girlfriend Khushi Kapoor has been roped in for Naadaniyaan, alongside Ibrahim Ali Khan.
summary: Netizens speculate that Khushi wore a bracelet that spelt out Vedang's name. However, the image is unclear.
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18

title: Actress Shraddha Das Debuts As Playback Singer With Kanguva
text:
Actress Shraddha Das is renowned for her work across different film industries in India. The actress made her debut with the 2008 film Siddu from Sikakulam and played prominent roles in Arya 2, Royal Bengal Tiger, Zid and Lahore, among others. Celebrated for her acting prowess and impeccable fashion sense, she has created a strong fan base among the audience and movie critics.
The actress is now making her mark as a playback singer. She is lending her vocals to the much-anticipated film Kanguva in the peppy track Yolo. She sang the number alongside Devi Sri Prasad and Sagar. The music for the song is composed by Devi Sri Prasad, while the lyrics are by Rakendu Mouli. The song received much praise, where fans called it a refreshing blend of talent. It has quickly gained traction and amassed millions of views on YouTube. Several fans also dropped heart emojis in the comment section to express their love.

Beyond this, Shraddha Das recently wowed audiences in a recent live concert held in Hyderabad’s Gachibowli. She sang several songs, leaving fans impressed with her versatility and stage presence. With her successful transition, the actress is proving to be a multi-talented star. As the release of Kanguva draws closer, her popularity as a singer will surely add another layer of excitement to the film.
Directed by Siva, Kanguva stars Suriya, Bobby Deol and Disha Patani in important roles. The action drama is slated to hit the theatres worldwide on November 14 in several languages, including Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, Hindi, English, French and Spanish. The film was initially set to release on Dussehra on October 10 but was postponed to avoid a clash with Rajnikanth’s Vettaiyan.
The film also features Jagapathi Babu, Prakash Raj, Yogi Babu, KS Ravikumar, Harish Uthaman, Kovai Sarala, Vasundhara Kashyap and Anandraj. It is produced by KE Gnanavel Raja and Vamsi Pramod under the banner of Studio Green and UV Creations.
summary: Shraddha is lending her vocals to the much-anticipated film Kanguva in the peppy track Yolo.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: When Abhishek Bachchan Defended Aishwarya Rai Against ‘Plastic’ Label: ‘I’m Speaking As A Co-Star…’
text:
Aishwarya Rai has long captivated audiences around the world, enchanting fans with both her remarkable talent and timeless beauty. Often hailed as “one of the most beautiful women in the world,” Aishwarya first gained international recognition by winning the Miss World pageant in 1994 before diving into a celebrated career in cinema. However, her journey has not been without its challenges. Like many prominent actresses, Aishwarya has faced her share of criticism, with misogynistic remarks attempting to belittle her appearance, physique, and acting abilities. She has, however, consistently risen above the negativity, paying no attention to detractors and continuing to thrive in the industry. On one occasion, though, her husband Abhishek Bachchan stood up in her defense, addressing those who label her “plastic.”
“Actually if you go to see… and now I’m not speaking like a husband, I’m speaking as a co-star and an actor… she happens to have done some of the most daring kind of roles, that an actor, who’s basically meant to have been known only for her beauty, could have done,” Abhishek asserted in an interview with BBC Asian Network, as reported by Times of India. He went on to cite films such as Jag Mundhra’s Provoked (2006), Rituparno Ghosh’s Chokher Bali (2003), Raincoat (2004), and Mani Ratnam’s Guru (2007) to highlight her diverse and courageous choice of roles. Abhishek’s words encouraged the public to see Aishwarya as not just a beauty icon, but as a multifaceted talent worthy of respect and recognition.
Aishwarya began her acting career with a dual role in Mani Ratnam’s epic political drama Iruvar (1997), which set the stage for her impressive career. Her contributions to Indian cinema have not gone unnoticed; in 2009, she was awarded the Padma Shri by the Indian government, and in 2012, she received the prestigious Order of Arts and Letters from the French government. Most recently, she appeared in the Ponniyin Selvan films, where her performance won her several accolades and reaffirmed her acting prowess.
Amid her professional success, rumors have recently circulated about potential challenges in Aishwarya and Abhishek’s marriage of 17 years. The couple, however, has chosen to remain silent on the matter, maintaining a dignified stance. Speculation intensified after they appeared separately for the media at a recent high-profile Ambani family wedding — Aishwarya with their daughter Aaradhya, while Abhishek posed with the Bachchan family, including his parents, Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan, his sister Shweta Bachchan, and her family.
summary: Aishwarya Rai, known for her timeless beauty and talent, has faced both admiration and criticism throughout her career. While she gracefully ignores detractors, her husband, Abhishek Bachchan, once defended her against those labeling her as “plastic.”
author: News18,Yatamanyu Narain

title: Rockstar Turns 13: Ranbir Kapoor Stayed At Hazrat Nizamuddin Dargah For Kun Faya Kun Qawwali Scene
text:
Rockstar completes 13 years today. There are several ways the movie and its music changed Indian cinema. The most fascinating narrative that hangs out from the making of the film is that of Ranbir Kapoor, who went out of the way to embody Janardan Jakhar. This transformative experience includes his stay at the Hazrat Nizamuddin Dargah in Delhi. For the qawwali scene in the song Kun Faya Kun, Kapoor stayed for nearly two days in Hazrat Nizamuddin Dargah. Rich in spiritual atmosphere and vivid qawwali performances, this shrine allowed Kapoor to receive insight into the cultural and spiritual components reflected in the film.
During his stay, Ranbir Kapoor was able to relate to the spirit behind the song, which in fact pursues the divine purpose. In a 2011 interview with the Hindustan Times, Ranbir himself called the experience “extremely spiritual”. 
Kun Faya Kun, produced by A.R. Rahman with lyrics from Irshad Kamil, became one of the most appreciated tracks of the Rockstar album. 
Initially, there were concerns regarding the religious tone of this song, Imtiaz Ali, who directed the movie, told Ranveer Allahbadia on his podcast. But the trio – Imtiaz Ali, A.R. Rahman and Irshad Kamil – decided to include it in the movie after due consultations concerning the fact that it was sensitive.
It was sung by Mohit Chauhan, Javed Ali and A R Rahman himself contributed to it. The dynamics of the lyrics and musical tune of Rockstar have made it a cult classic.
Meanwhile, Kapoor’s devotion was not restricted to his stay at the Dargah. He also went to live with a Jat family for several days so that he could better understand how grounded his character was. Such deep involvement enabled him to get a richer insight into the details of Janardan Jakhar’s opportunities and challenges, reports Pink Villa. More so, Kapoor worked very hard to master the guitar in order to look real on the screen.
The film was released on November 11, 2011, and has set a benchmark in the Indian film industry. It was further re-released in May 2024 and earned more than Rs 5.65 crores, Pink Villa adds. 
In an earlier interview with Indian Express, Imtiaz Ali revealed his interpretation of Janardan Jakhar saying the character was more of a “non-cerebral.” He added that upon rewatching the film, some of Janardan’s actions may seem illogical but they are a way of capturing his free spirit.
summary: Kun Faya Kun was sung by Mohit Chauhan. It is one of the most loved tracks from Rockstar’s album.
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18,Sahas

title: 'I wanted freedom': Rahul breaks silence on LSG's exit
text: NEW DELHI: KL Rahul finally broke his silence on his exit from Lucknow Super Giants, stating that he wanted to explore new options and was looking a team where he could play with freedom.Rahul's exit has triggered discussions within cricket circles regarding the circumstances of his departure. Questions arose about whether the team management decided to release him or if it was his personal choice. However, Rahul himself clarified that he wished to explore opportunities with a different franchise."I wanted to start fresh, I wanted to explore my options and I wanted to go and play where I could find some freedom. Team atmosphere would be lighter, sometimes you just need to move away and find something good for yourself and I have been out of the T20 team for a while," Rahul told Star Sports in their show Unplugged, the teaser of which has been posted on social media.— CricCrazyJohns (@CricCrazyJohns) Having been out of India's T20 team for more than two years, Rahul sets his sights on the upcoming IPL season to make a comeback to the national team. He expressed confidence, saying he understands what it takes to return to the national setup."I know where I stand as a player and I know what I need to do to get back. I look forward to this IPL season to give me that platform to go back and enjoy my cricket. My aim is to obviously to get back into the T20 team," he added.— StarSportsIndia (@StarSportsIndia) The LSG owner Sanjiv Goenka's passionate reaction following their embarrassing loss to Sunrisers Hyderabad in IPL 2024 revealed underlying tensions within the team's dressing room environment.Rahul, who captained LSG for three consecutive seasons, was notably absent from their retained players list, making him available for the IPL 2025 mega auction set for November 24 and 25 in Jeddah, where he will be amongst the most sought-after players.
summary: KL Rahul has opened up about his departure from the Lucknow Super Giants, citing a desire for a fresh start and more freedom. His exit follows speculation about team tensions and a disappointing season. Rahul aims to use the upcoming IPL season as a springboard back into the Indian T20 team after a two-year absence.
author: Toi Sports Desk

title: Fan Says Shraddha Kapoor’s Hoardings Are ‘Dangerous’, Actress Reacts
text:
Shraddha Kapoor is widely loved for her role in films such as Aashiqui 2 and the blockbuster Stree franchise. The actress often wins the hearts of her fans with killer posts on social media. And, the latest post was a hilarious Reels created by one of her fans who claimed that her hoardings on expressways are dangerous for youth.
The funny clip featured a man riding on a busy expressway. As vehicles pass through him, he can be heard saying, “Agar Expressway par aise advertisment honge toh yaar yuva thode khatre mein hai. Aise ads nahi hone chahiye. Dangerous hai thoda.” (If expressways have such advertisement boards, then the youth are in danger. Such ads shouldn’t be there, it is dangerous.” Next, in a surprising twist, he panned the camera to show a video advertisement of Shraddha Kapoor on a hoarding.
Shraddha was looking stunning in a pink lehenga in the life-size hoarding. The video did not end here. It also had a Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein connection, and the next shot was a scene where Maddy (R Madhavan) and his friend had a road accident while chasing the heroine.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sid Sharma (@simplysid08)

Sharing the clip on Instagram Stories, Sharddha dropped ROFL emojis.

Meanwhile, Shraddha Kapoor’s last film Stree 2 broke several Bollywood records. It became the highest-grossing Hindi film of all time with Rs 713.5 crore at the Indian box office, after surpassing Shah Rukh Khan’s Jawan and Pathaan. title: Shah Rukh Khan Holds Pregnant Gauri Khan Close In Throwback Photo From Before Aryan Khan's Birth
text:
Gauri Khan’s photo from when she was pregnant with Aryan Khan in 1997 has resurfaced on social media and has caught everyone’s attention. In the viral photo, Shah Rukh Khan can be seen holding Gauri close as they pose with Chikky and Deanne Panday, who are Chunky Panday’s older brother and sister-in-law.
In the viral photo, Gauri can be seen flaunting a kurta with a red bindi and dark red lipstick as Shah Rukh held her close. The superstar donned a blue shirt with dark pants. The image was shared on Reddit with the caption, “SRK, Chikky Pandey, Gauri and Deanne together when they were both pregnant in 1997!!” The image also featured Deanne pregnant with Ahaan Panday.
Check out the photo here:
SRK, Chikky Pandey, Gauri and Deanne together when they were both pregnant in 1997!! 
byu/puckyt inBollyBlindsNGossip

Shah Rukh and Gauri have often spoken about her first pregnancy. In an old interview, Simi Garewal asked Gauri Khan if Shah Rukh Khan shared the pregnancy experience with her. Gauri said that Shah Rukh tried very hard. Recalling the time Gauri went into labour, Shah Rukh said, “I didn’t know how a woman reacts when she goes into labour. I had heard that you’re supposed to breathe with her, but she wasn’t breathing. Yeah, she was screaming very strangely, nothing like how they show in films.”
Gauri said, “I hardly had any labour pain because I had a Caesarean.” Shah Rukh added, “Then they went for the Caesarean and it was very stupid because I was like when the baby’s coming out, you’re supposed to breathe. I didn’t know that it didn’t matter with a Caesarean. I was still breathing like that.”
Recalling the time of Aryan’s delivery, Gauri said, “He was nearly pulling the baby out. The doctors were like, ‘Let us do our work.'” Shah Rukh said, “I went in with my mask and everything and took the baby out. I saw the incision and everything, though she told me not to see it. I really enjoyed the moment. I’m not trying to sound morbid or gruesome, but the sight of this, nature’s colours of even redness of the blood or blue parts there or yellow fat, it’s so translucent. It’s not at all gruesome. You’ll never see colours like that in your life.”
Meanwhile, Aryan will soon make his debut as a director with his web series based on the reality of the Hindi entertainment industry.
summary: Shah Rukh Khan and Gauri Khan posed with Deanne and Chikky Panday in the viral photo.
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18

title: Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5: Release Date, Where To Stream, Expected Plot And More
text:
Demon Lord Veltol and Takahashi stole a small cube from a Yakuza gang in the last episode. In it, they found a list of immortals’ names. Takahashi then accompanied Veltol to meet her client, only to find him dead in his office.

While there, she discovered a video that revealed a chilling truth about the city’s survival. With the episode ending with Machina unresponsive, fans can only wonder what will unfold next in Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5. Don’t miss the episode as it releases, and keep reading to find out the release date, where to watch it and more details.
Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5: Release date and where to stream

According to the official website, Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5 is slated to air on Sunday, November 10, 2024, at 11 pm JST. However, due to time zone differences, international viewers can watch it a day earlier, on Saturday, November 9, 2024.

In Japan, Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5 will be broadcast on multiple networks, including Tokyo MX, BS11, MBS, Gunma TV, AT-X, and Chukyo TV. For audiences in the USA, Africa, Europe, India, Oceania, CIS, and the Middle East, it will be available for streaming on Crunchyroll, while those in South Korea can access it on Aniplus TV.
Expected plot in Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5

Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5 will be titled ‘The Depths of the Crucible,’ according to the anime’s official website. The episode is expected to pick up just as Veltol urgently attempts to contact Machina about the horrifying truth behind the Aether Reactor.

Machina, unaware of this, will be seen preparing dinner and thinking about Veltol. Her evening wil take an unexpected turn when she receives a mysterious visitor. Demon Lord 2099 Episode 5 is likely to explore Veltol’s plan of action regarding the Immortal Furnace.
Demon Lord 2099 Episode 4 recap

Demon Lord 2099 Episode 4, titled ‘The Shadows of Shinjuku,’ begins with Takahashi using her hacking abilities to inspect a storage room, with Veltol accompanying her. Their mission is to retrieve a small cube assigned by Takahashi’s client.

Veltol enters the room, using the power derived from his followers’ faith to overpower the guards. However, his confidence is shaken when a Magino Gear, specifically the fourth-generation model called Ashed Dawn, emerges.

This advanced mecha, usually reserved for the City Guard, surprises both Takahashi and Veltol. Despite his best efforts, Veltol struggles against its might and is temporarily incapacitated in Demon Lord 2099 Episode 4.
https://twitter.com/AisDanmachi/status/1853302360849690769Drawing upon his immortality, he recovers and manages to destroy the Magino Gear. After retrieving the cube, they discover it contains a list of Immortals. They rush to meet their client Ejyu, only to find him murdered, with his Familia system damaged.

A hidden video reveals the city’s dark secret: the Aether Reactor powers Shinjuku by burning Immortals alive. Concerned, Veltol attempts to reach Machina. Demon Lord 2099 Episode 4 ends as she remains unresponsive.

For more updates from the Demon Lord 2099 anime, keep up with Pinkvilla.

*The release dates and times provided are accurate at the time of writing and are subject to change at the discretion of the creators.
summary:
Drawing upon his immortality, he recovers and manages to destroy the Magino Gear. After retrieving the cube, they discover it contains a list of Immortals. They rush to meet their client Ejyu, only to find him murdered, with his Familia system damaged.



A hidden video reveals the city’s dark secret: the Aether Reactor powers Shinjuku by burning Immortals alive. Concerned, Veltol attempts to reach Machina. Demon Lord 2099 Episode 4 ends as she remains unresponsive.



For more updates from the Demon Lord 2099 anime, keep up with Pinkvilla.



*The release dates and times provided are accurate at the time of writing and are subject to change at the discretion of the creators.
author: Sneha Sam

title: Will Kate Middleton Join the Royal Family For the Festival of Remembrance Amid Her Chemotherapy? Find Out Here
text:
Remembrance Sunday is nothing short of a major festival for the royal family. Kate Middleton has never missed the event even once since she got married to Prince William, and reportedly, she's not going to start now. The Princess of Wales has been mostly out of the public eye for the last few months since she revealed her cancer diagnosis. But according to Buckingham Palace, she is all set to return during the Festival of Remembrance that is going to be held on Sunday.

For the people who are not aware of Remembrance Day; it is held every 2nd Sunday of November in the UK to pay homage to the ones martyred in the line of duty during the 1st World War. Every year the royal family is present to pay their respects to the fallen.

Middleton will be joining the rest of the royal family, including, King Charles, Prince William, Princess Anne, Vice Admiral Sir Timothy Laurence, Prince Edward, Duke and Duchess of Gloucester, and the Duke of Kent. While Kate will be making her comeback, Queen Camilla might be missing from the event due to her recent struggles with chest infection. 

 Kate Middleton has been through her fair share of ups and downs in 2024. From wild conspiracies to people picking apart every single facet of her life in her absence. From accusations of photoshopped images to AI videos, it has been a tough year for the royal. But she's not the only one in her family going through a challenging time right now, with King Charles going through chemotherapy as well.

Prince Charles opened up about her wife and father's cancer diagnosis. He called it the "hardest" year of his life. Adding, "Trying to get through everything else and keep everything on track has been really difficult." However, he said, "I'm so proud of my wife, I'm proud of my father, for handling the things that they have done."
ALSO READ: Prince William Opens Up About 'Brutal' Year As Kate Middleton And King Charles Battle Cancer
summary:
Kate Middleton has been through her fair share of ups and downs in 2024. From wild conspiracies to people picking apart every single facet of her life in her absence. From accusations of photoshopped images to AI videos, it has been a tough year for the royal. But she's not the only one in her family going through a challenging time right now, with King Charles going through chemotherapy as well.



Prince Charles opened up about her wife and father's cancer diagnosis. He called it the "hardest" year of his life. Adding, "Trying to get through everything else and keep everything on track has been really difficult." However, he said, "I'm so proud of my wife, I'm proud of my father, for handling the things that they have done."
author: Apoorva Rastogi

title: MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6: Release Date, Where To Stream, Expected Plot And More
text:
MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6 is set to depict the last lap of the Ashinoko GT race, with Kanata ever resolved to overcome the upcoming challenges before him. The episode will see the race’s end coincide with the end of the rain, just as fog sets in. 

Don’t miss MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6 to find out how Kanata takes advantage of this unpredictable terrain. Keep reading to find out the release date, expected plot, and more.
MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6: Release date and where to stream

MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6 is set to release on Monday, November 11, 2024, at 12 am JST. Due to time zone differences, international viewers will be able to watch it a day earlier, on Sunday, November 10, with release times adjusted to their local time zones. 

In Japan, MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6 will air on Tokyo MX and BS11, with RKB Mainichi Broadcasting broadcasting it at 1:20 am. Other networks, such as Yomiuri TV and TV Aichi, will air it later. International viewers can catch it on Crunchyroll, which will simulcast it shortly after the Japanese broadcast.
Expected plot in MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6

As per the anime’s official website, MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6 will be titled ‘The Devil of Ashinoko Skyline.’ The episode will see the race reach its final lap just as the rain over Ashinoko stops, leading to dense fog enveloping the track.

This fog, known as the ‘Devil of Ashinoko,’ drastically reduces visibility. Despite this, MFG officials decide to continue the race. Kanata will see this unexpected fog as a potential advantage in MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 6, telling Ogata that this could be a divine opportunity. 
MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 5 recap

MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 5, titled ‘A Cruel Reality,’ opens with Kanata skillfully maneuvering his Toyota 86 through the slippery volcanic ash-laden death zone. However, the harsh reality of racing at this level soon becomes apparent. 

Kanata faces unexpected challenges when Beckenbauer, Sawatari, and Sakamoto push their high-powered vehicles to the limit, forcing Kanata to adapt quickly. The episode also shows the stark performance differences between Kanata’s Toyota 86 and the more powerful 4WD and turbocharged cars.

Meanwhile, Ogata and Aiba analyze Kanata’s performance from the sidelines.

They acknowledge the hurdles he faces in this high-stakes environment. MF Ghost Season 2 Episode 5 ends with Kanata determined to overcome these setbacks as he prepares for the final lap of the race.

title: Netflix co-CEO reveals 'most-popular' drama series on platform
text: Netflix India, the streaming giant's local subsidiary, has reported a 49% increase in net profit to Rs 52 crore for the fiscal year ending March 2024. This growth was fueled by a 29% rise in gross revenue to Rs 2,845 crore, driven by a growing subscriber base and the successful launch of mobile-specific plans. Netflix India’s gross turnover rose 29% to Rs 2,845 crore from Rs 2,214 crore in FY23, boosted by a growing subscriber base, show its financial data sourced by business intelligence platform Tofler.During the company's recent earnings calls, global executives highlighted India as a key market for subscriber growth and revenue. During the third-quarter earnings call, Co-CEO Greg Peters said that markets like India exemplified Netflix’s decade-long investment in local creative communities, partnering with storytellers to help them deliver compelling narratives to audiences.Most popular drama series and movies on Netflix India in fiscal 2024 During Netflix's second-quarter earnings call, the company highlighted India as the second-largest market globally for paid net subscriber additions in the June-ended quarter and third in revenue percentage growth. With an estimated 12 million subscribers, Netflix, according to Media Partners Asia, is said to be India's largest pure-play streaming service. The company's recent success can be attributed to its increased focus on local content. Sarandos highlighted that Heeramandi, directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali, was Netflix India’s biggest drama series, with 15 million views. The platform also disclosed that Amar Singh Chamkila achieved 8.3 million views, while licensed films like Laapataa Ladies and Shaitaan also contributed to subscriber growth."Our original films and licensed films, including those released in the pay-TV window following theatrical releases, continue to thrill our members,” Sarandos said in July.
summary: Netflix India reported a 49% surge in net profit to Rs 52 crore for fiscal year 2024, fueled by a 29% growth in revenue, reaching Rs 2,845 crore. This success is attributed to a growing subscriber base, the introduction of mobile-specific plans, and a strategic focus on local content production.

title: Ridley Scott Was Offered To Direct Top Gun: Maverick But Declined Because Of THIS Reason
text:
Trigger Warning: This article contains mention of death and suicide

While Top Gun: Maverick played its upper hand at the box office, it saw the absence of its original director, Tony Scott. Meanwhile, his brother Ridley Scott was offered the opportunity to direct the new installment; however, he declined.

Recently, while opening up about the offer and the reason he had not accepted it, the director—who has given us some of the most remarkable movies such as Gladiator—made everyone a bit emotional.

In an interview with The Hollywood Reporter, Ridley Scott revealed that the film was originally offered to him. He further explained, “I said, ‘I don’t want to follow my brother.’ Tony was always interested in today.”

The House of Gucci director went on to mention that many of his projects are based on history. If not, he prefers to make movies based on fantasy or stories that explore science fiction.

“Tony didn’t like fantasy,” the filmmaker added.

The film Top Gun: Maverick was later directed by Joseph Kosinski.

For those who may not know, Tony Scott directed the original Top Gun in 1986, an action-adventure classic. His other film credits include beloved movies such as True Romance and Man on Fire. The highly acclaimed director passed away in August 2012, by suicide. He was 68.

Speaking of Joseph Kosinski, he has also directed notable films such as Only the Brave and the 2010 sequel to an epic movie, Tron: Legacy, among others.

When asked by THR if he would like to add anything to the conversation about his brother, the Exodus: Gods and Kings director touchingly stated, "I miss my brother."

 Just as the original Top Gun left a tremendous impact on the world, its sequel, Top Gun: Maverick, was also a major hit.

The movie is led by Tom Cruise, who reprises his role as Pete "Maverick" Mitchell. In the latest installment, Cruise’s Maverick becomes the trainer of a new generation of pilots.

The film also stars Miles Teller and Glen Powell, with Val Kilmer reprising his iconic role from the original as Tom "Iceman" Kazansky.

Meanwhile, get ready for another blockbuster that's about to hit the big screen, as Ridley Scott is returning with the sequel to Gladiator.

The sequel will star Paul Mescal, alongside an impressive cast that includes Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn, and more.

Gladiator II is set to be released on November 22, 2024.

Disclaimer: If you know someone who is having suicidal thoughts, anxiety, going through depression, or is suffering from a serious mental illness, reach out to a nearby doctor, mental health expert, or an NGO for immediate help.​ There are several helplines available for the same.
ALSO READ: Top Gun: Maverick Star Monica Barbaro Recalls Receiving THIS ‘Weirdest Advice’
summary:
Just as the original Top Gun left a tremendous impact on the world, its sequel, Top Gun: Maverick, was also a major hit.



The movie is led by Tom Cruise, who reprises his role as Pete "Maverick" Mitchell. In the latest installment, Cruise’s Maverick becomes the trainer of a new generation of pilots.



The film also stars Miles Teller and Glen Powell, with Val Kilmer reprising his iconic role from the original as Tom "Iceman" Kazansky.



Meanwhile, get ready for another blockbuster that's about to hit the big screen, as Ridley Scott is returning with the sequel to Gladiator.



The sequel will star Paul Mescal, alongside an impressive cast that includes Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn, and more.



Gladiator II is set to be released on November 22, 2024.

The last episode of Tower Of God Season 2 saw a number of events occur, including Anaak growing suspicious of Viole's connection to Baam and Endorsi’s plans to confront him about his past. With the upcoming episode set to reveal a rematch between Anaak and Ran, fans are more excited than ever.

Don’t miss Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19 to find out what happens after Beta approaches Baam, as well as the results of Anaak’s match. Keep reading to discover the release date, expected plot, and more details. 
Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19: Release date and where to stream

Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19 is set to premiere on Sunday, November 10, 2024, at 11:00 pm JST, as announced on the anime's official website. This equates to a same-day release around 2:00 pm GMT / 10:00 am ET / 7:00 am PT. Keep in mind that the exact release time may vary based on your location and time zone.

The episode will air on Japanese TV channels including Tokyo MX, KBS Kyoto, Sun Television, and BS Nippon Television. International viewers can watch Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19 with English subtitles on Crunchyroll, available 30 minutes after the Japanese broadcast.
Expected plot in Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19

Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 19 will be titled ‘All In,’ as per the title preview at the end of the last episode. The episode is expected to feature a showdown between Anaak and Ran after Viole interrupted their previous confrontation. 

This battle will be an opportunity for them to finally settle their unfinished score, with both combatants eager to prove their strength. Tower Of God Season 2 Episode 18, titled ‘The Mad Dog and the Lizard,’ continues with Miseng and Prince being offered new powers by Verdi. Prince refuses, preferring to rely on his own strength, but Miseng accepts, transforming into a formidable opponent.

title: Devara Part 1 streaming on OTT: Here's where you can watch Janhvi Kapoor, Jr NTR, Saif Ali Khan film
text: Movie watchers will have a tough time deciding what to watch this weekend with two of the most anticipated films dropping on OTT platforms. Kareena Kapoor's The Buckingham Murders has landed on Netflix and Devara part 1 has also released on an OTT giant. The film that marked Janhvi Kapoor's south debut is now available for watching on an OTT platform. The film ha Jr NTR playing dual roles as Devara and Vara. Janhvi Kapoor plays the role of his love interest and Saif Ali Khan will be seen as the antagonist Bhaira. Directed by Koratala Siva, the film did a good business at the box office but failed to do any wonders. Jr NTR had blamed the audience for the box office numbers. Talking to India Today, the RRR actor had said that the audience has become quite negative these days. On Devara BO numbers "We, as an audience, have become very negative these days. We are not able to enjoy a film in an innocent manner anymore," he said. "I wonder why we are not able to be that innocent anymore? Every film today, we are watching it to analyse. We are all constantly judging, analysing, and overthinking about films. Maybe our exposure to cinema has made us like this," he further added. Janhvi's acting brilliance However, when it came to Janhvi Kapoor, Jr NTR had some of the best things to say. He recalled how there was unpredictability and fear of dance and acting before she gave her first shot. However, once the cameras started rolling, Janhvi just killed it. "The first shot, she came and she gave. She just killed it. With so much pressure, it was a delight seeing her open up on camera," he told a website in an interview. When and where to watch Devara part 1 is now available for streaming on OTT giant Netflix. But, there is a catch. The film has now released just in Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Kannada only. The film is expected to be launched for the Hindi audience later or on some other platform.
summary: Jr NTR, Saif Ali Khan, Janhvi Kapoor starrer Devara part 1 is available for streaming on OTT giant but with a twist.
