title: Bollywood Newswrap November 8, 2024: Virat Kohli’s ‘chilled-out’ birthday with Anushka and kids, Athiya Shetty and KL Rahul announce pregnancy
text:
Trigger Warning: This article contains mentions of death and death threats.

Today, November 8, 2024 was filled with important announcements and revelations. So, if you missed out on any important Bollywood news from today, we have got you covered. From Virat Kohli recalling his ‘chilled-out birthday celebration with Anushka and kids to Athiya Shetty and KL Rahul announcing they are set to embrace parenthood, get updated on the highlights from the day. 

Here are the top 5 newsmakers from November 8, 2024:

1. Virat Kohli revealed he enjoyed a ‘chilled-out’ birthday with wife, Anushka Sharma, kids Vamika and Akaa

Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma prefer to keep their personal life away from media glares. But, they do share some insights about it once in a while in interviews or conversations. Recently, the senior cricketer attended an event for HSBC in Mumbai and revealed details about his 36th birthday on November 5, 2024. 

He shared that he enjoyed a ‘chilled-out’ birthday with his family and the celebration as he enjoyed his time with Anushka and his kids at home. Also, Kohli mentioned that the birthday celebration was mainly for his daughter. 

2. Shah Rukh Khan received death threat from a lawyer's stolen number who earlier filed complaint of objections against dialogue in 1994 film Anjaam

Recently, Shah Rukh Khan received death threats from an unknown caller and police began to investigate the case. PTI revealed that they found the number making threat calls belonged to a lawyer who claimed his phone was stolen before those calls were made. 

However, it has been found that the lawyer in question, Faizan Khan, had previously filed a complaint against the actor over one of his dialogue about deer hunting in his 1994 film Anjaam. 

3. Salman Khan received death threat from Lawrence Bishnoi gang as he shoots for Sikander with 4-tier security 

Salman Khan, who is receiving daily threats from the Lawrence Bishnoi gang, received a fresh death threat over one of his songs from the gang. As per a report in Mid-Day, the actor is meanwhile shooting in Hyderabad for his upcoming film Sikandar with a four-level security cover. A total of 50 to 70 guards at duty for his safety. 

At the same time, the hotel where Khan is staying during this time has put high security measures. Also, the guests and staff are screened thoroughly. 

4. Deepika Padukone was spotted with her daughter Dua and Ranveer Singh at the airport

Deepika Padukone was spotted with her daughter Dua and husband, Raveer as they went to Kalina airport. The actress held her daughter close to her while Singh was seen looking after them as the family of three left for their first vacation. 

However, their faces weren't clearly seen as they avoided posing for the paps. But, the photos and videos of their appearance went viral and fans were delighted to get a glimpse of the newborn. 

5. Athiya Shetty and KL Rahul announced pregnancy, will welcome their baby in 2025

One of the most admired couples in Bollywood, Athiya Shetty and KL Rahul announced they are set to welcome their first child together. They took to their Instagram handles and shared a collaborative post to share the news that read, “Our beautiful blessing is coming soon in 2025—Athiya and Rahul" 

The couple immediately began receiving warm wishes from celebrities like Anushka Sharma, Alia Bhatt, Sonakshi Sinha, Rakul Preet Singh, Ananya Panday, and more. Also, Suniel Shetty who is set to become a grandfather re-shared the post on his Instagram handle and penned, “Blessed.”

title: Vivo X200 Series: A New Chapter of Smartphone Innovation
text:
Recently, Vivo finally launched its long-awaited X200 series. This is a landmark for the company in their search for new frontiers in smartphone technology. This innovation in design, better performance, and amazing camera upgrade, Vivo X200 series is sure to capture the hearts of both tech-savvy and casual users.

Sleek and Modern Design and Display

The Vivo X200 series is more mature, premium build quality with an aesthetic design. They are sleek, light in weight, and available in several sophisticated colors, such as Cosmic Black, Arctic Blue, and Midnight Silver. The X200 series is built around an amazing AMOLED display, which delivers vibrant colors and deep blacks for the most immersive viewing experience ever. The X200 Pro comes with a 6.7-inch curved display with a 120Hz refresh rate, making it a smooth navigator and great for fluid gameplay. The standard X200 model comes with a slightly smaller but still impressive 6.5-inch display.

Both the devices sport an in-display fingerprint scanner along with ultra-thin bezel design, which makes them look beautiful and feel great in hand. Additionally, their IP68-rated water and dust resistance features are included so as to give durability to their premium design.

Performance, Power, Speed and Efficiency

Under the hood, the Vivo X200 series is equipped with the latest Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, bringing premium performance to both variants. It pairs this heavy-duty processor with up to 12GB of RAM and internal storage up to 512GB. This sets the ground for each user to multitask without hesitation and store large amounts of data without compromising on speed and efficiency.

The X200 Pro makes a great product for mobile gamers who love high-performance applications. It comes with a 5000mAh battery, fast charging 120W that promises to fully charge the phone in under 30 minutes, which eliminates downtime and keeps a person connected all day long.

Photography and Videography Excellence

The camera setup on the X200 is the most spectacular feature from the camera-centric series by Vivo. On the standard model, while the similar ultra-wide lenses and 50MP telephoto setup complement a camera system similar to that featured on the top-end model but with less advanced, carrying a slightly reduced resolution to 64MP for this primary lens.

A signature Gimbal Stabilization 2.0 system within Vivo ensures very stable shots, regardless of conditions, combined with amazing computational photography from enhanced AI capabilities, making it suitable for stills and video capture. Video recording, including 8K capabilities, means content capture at high-quality levels is always quite easy.

Smooth Software Experience

On the software front, X200 series comes with Android 14 and is running on Vivo’s Funtouch OS 15. That brings to you a clean and intuitive interface with plenty of options for personalisation. That seems to have improved their privacy feature, be better than previous task managers, and has more AI capabilities that give smarter interaction with devices.

New Benchmark

The X200 series indeed remains a Vivo push for innovation in smartphone form and functionality. Whether photography, gaming, or an all-around premium smartphone, the X200 series delivers well-balanced performance, design, and cutting-edge features in its package. As Vivo remains one of the leaders in mobile technology, the X200 series is evidence of such dedication towards new-age top-tier smartphones in global markets.
summary: Recently, Vivo finally launched its long-awaited X200 series. This is a landmark for the company in their search for new frontiers in smartphone technology. This innovation in design, better performance, and amazing camera upgrade, Vivo X200 series is sure to capture the hearts of both tech-savvy and casual users. Sleek and Modern Design and Display […]
author: Sreyashi Bhattacharya

title: Will Gisele Bundchen marry boyfriend Joaquim Valente? Here's what her friends are saying
text: Pregnant Gisele Bundchen discusses getting married' with Joaquim Valente, according to friends. The good news was a huge surprise. The world found out that the supermodel, 44, is pregnant on October 28, which is precisely two years to the day that she and Tom Brady got divorced after 13 years of marriage. This is her first child with boyfriend Joaquim Valente, even though she has two children with the former professional quarterback, Benjamin, 14, and Vivian, 11, as quoted in a report by Life & Style.However, she has been keeping more secrets than just her expanding belly. The 35-year-old jiu-jitsu instructor and the Brazilian beauty have a relationship that has felt right to her from the beginning. All appeared natural and effortless as quoted in a report by Life & Style.It surprised her to experience such feelings so soon after her toxic divorce because she wasn't sure she would ever experience them again. Gisele, however, feels seen at last. According to friends, she refers to Joaquim as her soulmate, and the two are getting married. Also Read: Harry's U.S. visa in jeopardy again? Donald Trump's election victory could complicate things for the princeGisele's main focus right now is her pregnancy, and she plans to give birth at her Florida mansion. She grew up with five sisters and loves the energy of being surrounded by women. Supportive Joaquim would be fine with leading his life outnumbered by strong females, as he has a sister himself and two brothers. Gisele's kids have grown close to Joaquim since he became their jiu-jitsu instructor in 2021.Gisele was seen with Joaquim in Costa Rica weeks after her split from Tom in the following year, but sources insist things turned romantic until the summer of 2023. This is the first time Gisele is seeing someone who was a friend of her first.Gisele has also been transparent with Tom Brady about her pregnancy, telling him about it before the public found out. They don't really communicate outside of matters regarding their children, so he's not a big part of her life. Rumors began when Tom shared a cryptic social media post on Instagram, including a photo of a sunset, Landslide, a song about accepting change, three heart emojis, and lyrics. Media reports have claimed the announcement was hard pill to swallow for Tom, who is furious with himself.When Netflix put Tom in the hot seat at a comedy roast in May, stand-up stars like Jeff Ross reminded him that Gisele had moved on. Also Read : Chelsea vs Arsenal Premier League live streaming: Prediction, kick off time, how to watch soccer gameAfter learning about her pregnancy, Jeff Ross said he's up for another round of roasting. Gisele denies the narrative, calling it a lie that happens to many women who get blamed when they have the courage to leave an unhealthy relationship. She is tuning out the noise, saying her relationship with Joaquim was a breath of fresh air after her divorce, and becoming a mother again is truly a dream come true for her.FAQsIs Gisele Bündchen preparing to marry Joaquim Valente?Yes, Gisele and Joaquim are reportedly planning a small, intimate wedding in Miami centered on family. Friends believe the couple has a strong bond, and Joaquim is her soulmate.How does Gisele handle her pregnancy and relationship with Joaquim?Gisele is prioritizing her pregnancy and planning a family with Joaquim. Their relationship has grown stronger, and her children with Tom Brady have developed a bond with Joaquim since he became their jiu-jitsu instructor.
summary: Gisele Bündchen, who is expecting a child with boyfriend Joaquim Valente, is reportedly considering marriage. Friends say her relationship with the jiu-jitsu instructor feels natural, and rumors of a small Miami ceremony are circulating.

title: Telugu University to be in Rajamahendravaram: Durgesh
text: Kakinada: Tourism minister Kandula Durgesh said efforts are being made for establishing the Telugu University in Rajamahendravaram, as the city is the right place for locating it.Participating as chief guest at a seminar on “Andhra Pradesh – Cultural Glory” jointly organised by the AdiKavi Nannayya University College of Arts and Commerce, Andhra Pradesh Rashtra Srujanatmaka and Samskrithika Samithi, and the Centre for Andhra Pradesh on Friday, Durgesh said Andhra Pradesh has a vast repertoire of historical culture, literature and fine arts, like dramas, Pouranika and Padya natikas. He said Padya Natakam is unique to Telugu people in the country. He called upon people, in particular literature experts, academicians, artists and others, to explain the glory of Andhra Pradesh to the world.Rajanagaram MLA Bathula Bala Ramakrishna said the help of Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu, Deputy Chief Minister K. Pawan Kalyan, education minister Nara Lokesh and minister Durgesh will be taken for developing the AdiKavi Nannayya University. University vice chancellor Y. Srinivasa Rao said that students have been provided a very peaceful atmosphere for pursuing quality education. Dr. Karri Rama Reddy appealed to the state government to fill up the vacant faculty posts, so that the quality of education in the university could be improved. Ch. Vijayananda Aditya, Prof. K. Sriramesh and D. Jyothirmayi were among those present.

title: Happy Birthday Prithvi Shaw: Career Stats, Top 5 Innings, And Controversies
text:
Dubbed as one of the most promising young Indian cricketers, Prithvi Shaw celebrates his 25th birthday today, November 9. Prithvi started his professional journey as one of the brightest prospects in the game. He drew several comparisons with Sachin Tendulkar due to his unique playing style. Despite all the hype, Prithvi failed to deliver on an individual level with unimpressive showings in the limited outings he had in international cricket.
ALSO READ: ‘Even Legends Like Don Bradman Experienced Being Dropped…’: Greg Chappell Writes Letter To Prithvi Shaw
Moreover, his career was marred with several controversies which further ruined his prospect of representing the national side on the biggest stages. On his special day, let’s take a look at some of his best knocks, his career statistics and the controversies around him.
Career Stats
Prithvi Shaw featured in five Tests, six ODIs and one T20I for India. He scored 339 Test runs and 189 ODI runs. He also had several opportunities to prove his mettle in the Indian Premier League (IPL). Prithvi has played seven seasons in the franchise tournament. He featured in 79 matches while adding 1892 runs.
Top 5 knocks
134 vs West Indies, 2018
Almost six years ago, Prithvi Shaw scored his maiden international century against the West Indies. The Indian batter contributed towards India’s dominant victory as she scored a quick 154-ball 134 in Rajkot. He smashed 19 boundaries and won the Player of the Match award.
99 vs Kolkata Knight Riders, 2019
Prithvi Shaw fell one run short of his first-ever IPL ton in 2019 at the Feroz Shah Kotla (now Arun Jaitley Stadium). Competing against the Kolkata Knight Riders, Prithvi smashed a 55-ball 99 before losing being dismissed by Lockie Ferguson. He departed hitting 12 boundaries and three sixes.
82 vs Kolkata Knight Riders, 2021
Prithvi Shaw proved to be a nightmare for the Kolkata Knight Riders once again in 2021. He led a successful chase for the Delhi Capitals, scoring a 41-ball 82. He scored 11 fours and three sixes as Delhi won the fixture by seven wickets.
66 vs Mumbai Indians, 2024
Prithvi Shaw’s most recent terrific performance came during the 2024 edition of the IPL. In a Delhi Capitals shirt, Prithvi scored 66 runs facing 40 deliveries while chasing a massive target of 234. He smashed eight fours and three sixes. His knock was eventually shadowed by his teammate Tristan Stubbs who scored a 25-ball 71.
66 vs Kolkata Knight Riders, 2020
Kolkata Knight Riders faced the wrath of Prithvi Shaw on another occasion in 2020. The Indian batter had hit a quick-fire 41-ball 66. He scored four boundaries and four sixes. His heroics proved crucial as Delhi won the fixture by 18 runs.
Controversies
In February last year, Prithvi Shaw was caught up in a heated situation after allegedly denying a selfie to his fans.
Ahead of the 2022 IPL, it was mandated by the National Cricket Academy (NCA) that all centrally contracted players were to undergo a Yo-Yo fitness test. It was applicable to every player regardless of their health or injury status. Prithvi Shaw took part in the test but did not receive a clearance.
During the 2019 edition of the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, Prithvi Shaw’s reputation was ruined by a harmless cough syrup. Traces of a substance banned in WADA’s illegal substances list, terbutaline, were found in his samples.
As per the norms, Prithvi received an eight-month ban from the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) for violating the doping regulations.
summary: Prithvi Shaw has featured in five Tests, six ODIs and one T20I for India.
author: News18,Nibandh Vinod

title: Candyman Star, Tony Todd Dies At 69
text:
Tony Todd, widely known for his chilling performances in horror cinema, passed away on November 6 at his home in Los Angeles at the age of 69.

With over 240 film and TV credits to his name, Todd was celebrated for his portrayal of the title character in Candyman (1992) and its 2021 sequel, as well as for his roles in the Final Destination series and Platoon. His representatives confirmed his passing but did not disclose the cause.

From D.C. to Hollywood: Tony Todd’s Path to Stardom

Born on December 4, 1954, in Washington, D.C., Todd pursued acting at the Eugene O’Neill National Actors Theatre Institute and the Trinity Rep Conservatory, refining his powerful screen presence. One of his earliest roles included playing a troubled sergeant in the Oscar-winning Vietnam War film *Platoon*, which established him as a formidable character actor.

Tony Todd: A Familiar Face on Screen

Throughout the 1980s and 1990s, Todd appeared on popular TV series, including 21 Jump Street, Night Court, Law & Order, and Star Trek spinoffs. He had recurring roles on Homicide: Life on the Street and The Young and the Restless, consistently bringing depth to a wide range of characters. During this time, Todd also took on dramatic roles in films like Lean on Me and Bird.

Defining Horror: Candyman and Beyond

Todd’s breakout horror role came with his portrayal of the vengeful spirit in Candyman, a character based on a tragic figure from the 1800s named Daniel Robitaille. Reprising the role in the 2021 sequel, Todd continued to bring the haunting legend to life. Beyond Candyman, he was known for playing William Bludworth in the Final Destination series and Grange in The Crow, solidifying his legacy in the horror genre over a four-decade career.

Read More: Was Paul Mescal Not The First Choice For Gladiator II? Ridley Scott Reveals Why Saltburn Star Barry Keoghan Dropped Out
summary:
Tony Todd, widely known for his chilling performances in horror cinema, passed away on November 6 at his home in Los Angeles at the age of 69.

title: Dimple Kapadia Rolled Into Bobby Sets In Imported Car, Amitabh Bachchan Teased Rishi Kapoor: 'Your Heroine...'
text:
Back in the day, Rishi Kapoor couldn’t help but laugh about all the fun that unfolded on the sets of his debut film Bobby (1973). Dimple Kapadia, fresh into the industry, would roll onto the set in a fancy imported car. Meanwhile, Rishi, just starting out at 16, had a very different experience. He joked about how Amitabh Bachchan, filming Bombay To Goa on a nearby floor, would tease him about Dimple’s glamorous arrival. While Dimple had her posh ride, Amitabh Bachchan would show up in a humble Fiat, and Rishi had a “tooti footi” version of the same car. 
Talking to The Movie Moth, Rishi Kapoor had said, “When we were working for the film, Dimple used to come in a huge imported car. Around the same time, Amitabh Bachchan was shooting for Bombay To Goa on the adjacent floor. And we had just met, so he used to say, ‘Your heroine comes in a huge car.’ Those days, Amit ji used to come in a fiat and we also had a tooti footi fiat.”
Rishi Kapoor, known for teasing his co-stars, shared how he used to poke fun at Dimple Kapadia for her fancy imported car. He recalled, “We used to rag Dimple. And she used to tell us, ‘I am Raj Kapoor’s heroine, I am a star. If the film becomes hit, I am a star and even if not, I am still a star. I travel in a huge car.’ Now that I look back, I think she was right, She is a star.”
Both Neetu Singh and Dimple Kapadia reportedly auditioned for the lead role in Bobby. However, Raj Kapoor ultimately chose Dimple. According to film analyst Dilip Thakur, Neetu’s mother, Raaji, wanted her daughter to be launched as the film’s lead, but Raj Kapoor turned her down since Neetu had already worked as a child artist in a few films.
summary: Dimple Kapadia would roll onto Bobby set in an imported car. Rishi Kapoor, starting out at 16, had a very different experience
author: News18,Shreyanka Mazumdar

title: Setting fitness goals: Key to success with your trainer
text: Irv Rubenstein holds a doctorate in exercise science and has run a personal fitness training studio for 35 years in Nashville, Tennessee. Obviously, he speaks positively about the benefits of using a personal trainer, and this goes for grizzled-gym goers as well as beginners. “Most anybody can teach you how to do a bicep curl,” Rubenstein said in an interview with The Associated Press. “But only a few people can tell you how to do it if your shoulder’s hurting.” It can be a maze finding the trainer who is best for you, Rubenstein acknowledged. How much should credentials and education matter, or are personality and motivational skills more important? What about the cost? And how frequently should you use a personal trainer? These are just a few of the questions anyone who is searching for a trainer should ask. “How do you discern who is best?” Rubenstein asked. “That which works best for you is the best. But finding that is the challenge Education and credentials In the United States — and in many other countries — there is no national or local government body that licenses trainers. Certification is typically issued by private entities, some more respected than others and many are in the business of generating income more than credibility. The American College of Sports Medicine is the best known in the United States. In Canada, it’s the Canadian Academy of Sport and Exercise Medicine. “You probably should ask if the person is certified,” said Rubenstein, who runs STEPS Fitness. “I think that’s valuable, but I don’t think it’s essential. And you should ask about academic training.” He also issued a caveat. “If a person is getting all their information off the internet — to the extent you can discern that — I would avoid that person,” he said of a potential trainer. Personality and motivation Guy Andrews runs Exercise ETC. out of Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Like Rubenstein, he says trainers and clients have to jibe. Credentials are important, but a personality match is essential. “Primarily, it’s a service relationship,” Andrews said. “So, first you have to bond with the trainer. You’ve got to like them. The personality of me is paramount. I don’t care how well qualified someone is, how well educated they are. If you cannot enjoy working with them, the relationship is doomed to fail.” Asking friends or gym operators for referrals could be helpful in your search. A good benchmark for a successful relationship is how many years has the referrer spent with their trainer? “If clients have been with a trainer for eight or 10 years, that’s a good sign,” Andrews said. “Looking good in a tank top is not enough.” Rubenstein injected another truth and laughed: “Most people who are working with a trainer for any length of time will tell you they are the best.” Another good sign when rating trainers is whether they offer a “non-contractual relationship.” Meaning, you would not lose money if you discontinue the service. “Then you have a trainer with integrity and confidence and probably the skills to help you,” Rubenstein said. There is also a trainer’s style of motivation to consider. Rubenstein repeatedly said the quality of “compassion” was key in choosing the right person. But some may want a basic training drill sergeant to push them. “The rah-rah military attitude might work for the young, the very fit,” he said. “But for the average person that type of behavior might not be motivating or stimulating.” What’s the price? Price is difficult to pin down. Costs vary by country and within countries by geographic region. In the United States you might pay $100-150 per hour in larger cities, maybe $50-75 in other areas. Rubenstein also said the cost compared favorably with manicures and similar personal-care services. The cost can be prohibitive for some, Rubenstein said. It often eliminates the young and might favor older clients who have more spending power and need the service more. “It weeds out the people who would like a trainer from those who need one,” he said. How often with a trainer? Andrews and Rubenstein said that beginners should meet with a trainer two or three times per week for the first six weeks. After that, once a week might be enough, or even once or twice a month for maintenance and evaluation. “In terms of motivation, for the average person I don’t believe once a week is enough at the start,” Andrews said. Rubenstein elaborated: “If a person is not accustomed to being in a gym, not comfortable with it or not feeling safe, twice a week with a trainer is a basic routine that will give them benefits — muscular, cardiovascular, balance, etc. Once they learn it, a person can go once a week or once a month. But that means they have to be motivated.” Setting goals So, you’ve found your trainer and are ready to get to work. Now what? Set some goals. There are...

title: Want Kareena Kapoor’s Glow? Discover Her Simple Skincare Secrets
text:
Kareena Kapoor’s youthful glow and flawless skin have made her a beauty icon for many. She has, time and again, shared that her timeless radiance is due to a simple yet effective diet and skincare routine. Want to achieve a similar glow? In a 2018 interview with Vogue India, she revealed her “top three unbreakable skin commandments” along with her morning routine for luminous skin. Let’s explore the beauty secrets that keep her looking effortlessly ageless.
Kareena Kapoor’s morning routine is refreshingly simple: she starts her day with a serving of fresh fruit and a large glass of room-temperature water.
When asked about her diet and ‘unbreakable skin commandments,’ Kareena emphasised that a balanced diet is essential for glowing skin. She explained, “I feel when you’re well-nourished, you feel happy, and it shows on your skin. Strict diets often lead to binge eating, which can cause breakouts. Stick to three wholesome meals, or even four—healthy, satisfying food that brings you joy.”
Her top three skincare rules are straightforward but powerful: First, never sleep with makeup on; second, drink at least three litres of water daily; and finally, always keep your moisturiser close by, no matter where you are in the world.
In the same conversation, Kareena also shared her go-to remedy for breakouts. She suggested that dabbing a bit of toothpaste on the affected area can sometimes work wonders.
During the interview, the beauty also shared a skincare home remedy she and her family swear by. The actor said, “Almond oil—on a lazy day at home we just soak ourselves up in it! A combination of that and yoghurt is great for the face too, if you have dry skin.”
When discussing her skincare routine, Kareena emphasised her minimalist approach to products, focusing on essentials rather than an elaborate regimen. “My skin tends to be on the dryer side, so I always have my moisturiser handy,” she explained. She also shared her nightly ritual of applying a night cream to help repair her skin and incorporating a hydrating mask once a week.
For warmer days, she likes to spritz her face with mist to stay refreshed. Kareena also underscored the importance of hydration, both inside and out: “I drink at least three litres of water every day. No matter where I am, hydration is my mainstay,” she concluded.
summary: Read how Kareena Kapoor maintains her youthful glow with these simple yet effective skincare and nutrition tips.
author: News18,Riya Ashok Madayi

title: BLACKPINK’s Jisoo Prioritises Acting, Dismisses Solo Comeback Buzz
text:
Is BLACKPINK’s Jisoo planning a grand return to the music scene this December? Well, fans hoping for another solo hit will have to wait a bit longer. According to her agency, BLISSOO, Jisoo isn’t preparing for a solo comeback but is instead focussing on her acting career. The singer-turned-actress has set her sights on the screen and is reportedly preparing for upcoming projects rather than music. The rumours of Jisoo’s December 2025 solo comeback had quickly made waves, with some reports even claiming that her new music was in its final stages. However, BLISSOO was quick to clear the air on November 8, with a representative saying, “Jisoo’s solo comeback reports are not true.”
“The artist intends to focus on her acting career,” BLISSOO stated, according to Allkpop. Although this may be a letdown for those who were waiting for her solo music, especially after the success of her single FLOWER. At present, Jisoo is working hard to keep fans engaged with her ventures in the acting world.

Just recovered from my dental procedure today 🤕 and I came back really excited reading all these things about a Jisoo comeback & then a news claiming that's it's not true? WHAT ?
— sui (MANTRA) (@suiJENNIEris) November 8, 2024

After parting ways with YG Entertainment in 2023 alongside her BLACKPINK sisters, Jisoo launched her own agency, BLISSOO. Since then, she has been prioritising her film and drama projects over music, building an impressive filmography.
Jisoo recently completed her first film project, Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint, a screen adaptation of Sing Shong’s web novel. Set to release in the summer of 2025, the film will see Jisoo alongside top actors Lee Min Ho, Ahn Hyo Seop and Chae Soo Bin. Fans eagerly anticipate her big-screen debut, which promises to show yet another dimension of her talents.

Jisoo during Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint script reading pic.twitter.com/m28gQHWEwz
— jisoo (@jisoogaIIery) January 23, 2024

JISOO as Lee Jihye on ‘Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’ this summer of 2025! pic.twitter.com/wvUbR5d7WX
— jisoo (@jisoogaIIery) May 28, 2024

#JISOO will play the role Lee Ji-hye in the web novel movie “Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint” 
About the movie: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes… pic.twitter.com/9H6ipnvdXR
— BLACKPINK BLINK UNION ? (@BBU_BLACKPINK) October 24, 2023

But that’s not all. Jisoo is also getting ready to take on a gripping role in Newtopia (previously titled Influenza), a zombie-themed drama set to premiere on Coupang Play in January 2025. In this series, she will be starring as the girlfriend of Park Jung Min’s character, marking her return to K-drama three years after her memorable performance in Snowdrop (2021). Jisoo’s heartfelt chemistry with Jung Hae In in Snowdrop became the talk of the town, setting the bar high for her future acting roles.

First look at Jisoo and Park Jeongmin in ‘Newtopia.’ pic.twitter.com/xGKYa1mXYp
— Pop Base (@PopBase) August 1, 2024

snowdrop starring jung haein and kim jisoo out 18/12/2021 pic.twitter.com/6OcfUi5di7
— jisoo (@jisoosjpg) November 8, 2021

While her music fans may be feeling a little nostalgic for her debut single album ME, featuring tracks like FLOWER and All Eyes On Me, it seems Jisoo is determined to take her career in an exciting new direction.
summary: While her music fans may be feeling a little nostalgic for her debut single album ME, featuring tracks like FLOWER and All Eyes On Me, it seems Jisoo is determined to take her career in an exciting new direction.
author: News18,Sahas,Shrishti Negi

title: Actresses embrace maternal roles, Samantha joins bandwagon
text: In a notable shift in the Indian entertainment industry, several popular actresses are now taking on mother roles, adding depth to their filmographies and breaking traditional on-screen stereotypes. Samantha Ruth Prabhu, for instance, steps into her first maternal role in the Hindi web series Citadel: Honey Bunny. She joins Tamannaah, who portrayed a mother in her recent release Baak (titled Aranmanai 4 in Tamil). The trend continues with Anushka Shetty, who recently played a mother-to-be in Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty, encouraging more actresses to explore mature roles.Director Hemanth Madhukar believes these shifts reflect the actresses' versatility. “Tamannaah, known for her glamour in songs like Kaavaala and Aaj Ki Raat, took on the mother role in Aranmanai 4 because it fit her character in the sequel. Anushka Shetty, famed for diverse roles, also embraced a maternal character with conviction, showing that top actresses can handle these roles with grace and credibility,” he explained.Producer Lagadapati Sridhar acknowledges that some actresses are hesitant about accepting mother roles, fearing it might alter their "lover girl" image and limit their opportunities for glam-centric or romantic roles. However, he sees positive changes driven largely by the expansion of OTT platforms, which have reshaped the boundaries of casting and storytelling. “Young actresses like Keerthy Suresh, Neha Shetty, and Shraddha Srinath have redefined these roles, showing that playing a mother can be just another powerful character. For instance, Shruti Haasan took on a maternal role in Krack, Keerthy Suresh delivered a remarkable performance in Mahanati, and Neha Shetty impressed audiences in Gangs of Godavari.”Echoing this sentiment, actress Priyamani, who played a mother in The Family Man series, believes the stereotype is outdated. “Years ago, actresses were cautious about being typecast as on-screen mothers, but now filmmakers are creating layered, interesting roles that are too compelling to ignore,” she said. Priyamani added that, while she enjoyed her role in The Family Man, she will continue to choose roles that add to her growth as an artist.Director Hemanth Madhukar provided further context, pointing out that even established male stars are open to father roles. “We’ve seen Chiranjeevi play a father in Daddy, Venkatesh in Saindhav, and Nani in Hi Nanna and Jersey. With heroes like Vishwak Sen embracing fatherhood in Gangs of Godavari, actresses like Shruti Haasan, Nayantara, and Neha Shetty are also showing they’re game for these kinds of roles,” he noted.This new trend signals a refreshing shift in the industry, allowing actresses to broaden their roles and audiences to experience richer, more dynamic portrayals of family and relationships on screen.
author: BVS Prakash

title: Kareena drops cousin Nitasha Nanda’s cherished moment with Kapoor Family on her birthday
text:
Mumbai: Kareena Kapoor Khan recently took to social media to wish her cousin Nitasha Nanda on her birthday. She shared cherished memories of Nitasha with the Kapoor family.

On Saturday, Bebo posted sweet photos of Nitasha with her son Jeh and her parents, Randhir Kapoor and Babita Kapoor, on her Instagram stories. In the first image, little Jeh is seen planting a sweet kiss on Nitasha’s cheek.

Kareena captioned the post, “Happy birthday to my Tashu, have the bestest day, my love.” The second image shows Kareena posing with her parents and Nitasha. Alongside it, she wrote, “Love you big time.” The third set of photos shows Bebo striking a pose with Rima Jain, Aadar Jain, and Nitasha.

Nitasha Nanda is the daughter of Ritu and Rajan Nanda, and the niece of Randhir Kapoor, Rishi Kapoor, and Rajiv Kapoor. Both Nitasha and Kareena are part of the fourth generation of the Kapoor family.

Nitasha Nanda is a regular at Kapoor family parties and gatherings, and she shares a close bond with her cousins Kareena and Karisma Kapoor.

Meanwhile, the ‘Jab We Met’ actress, is currently enjoying the success of her recent release “Singham Again”, where she reprised her role as Avni. Rohit Shetty’s cop drama also stars Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, Ranveer Singh, Tiger Shroff, Deepika Padukone, and Jackie Shroff.

It is the fifth installment of Shetty's Cop Universe franchise and has become Shetty's 10th film to cross the Rs. 100 crore mark, making it the fastest to do so. In an Instagram post, the filmmaker thanked fans for their love and support, writing, “SINGHAM AGAIN, my 10th and fastest 100 cr film. For the past 16 films, one thing that has remained constant is your love. Thank you for all the support and love. Humbled.”

The film, inspired by the Ramayana, was released on November 1.
summary: On Saturday, Bebo posted sweet photos of Nitasha with her son Jeh and her parents, Randhir Kapoor and Babita Kapoor, on her Instagram stories. In the first image, little Jeh is seen planting a sweet kiss on Nitasha’s cheek.
author: IANS

title: Mom Malaika Arora Shares Sweet Post For 'Baby Boy' Arhaan Khan On His Birthday
text:
Arbaaz Khan and Malaika Arora’s son Arhaan Khan is celebrating his 22nd birthday today, November 9. To commemorate the special occasion, his doting mother shared a post on her Instagram account along with a sweet, heartfelt note for her “baby boy”. Malaika’s post featured several throwback pictures of her and Arhaan from over the years. The first picture was taken when Arhaan was a child. Malaika lovingly wrapped her son around her arms, and the mother-son duo flaunted their brightest smiles while posing for the camera.
In the next picture, a grown-up Arhaan was seen taking a stroll with his mother amidst beautiful autumn scenery. Following this, Malaika included a collage where her baby boy was seen swimming, and in another glimpse, she held him in her arms. The actress concluded her post with a single picture of Arhaan playing with their furbaby.
Sharing the post, Malaika wrote, “Happy birthday, my baby boy, mama loves u the mostesttttttttttttttt @iamarhaankhan”, and included several red heart emojis.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Malaika Arora (@malaikaaroraofficial)

Following Malaika’s post, many of her friends and fans started penning down their heartfelt birthday wishes for her son. Seema Sajdeh said, “Happy birthday, my Arhaan,” while Sussanne Khan wrote, “Happy birthday Arhaan.” Saba Pataudi added, “Happy Birthday to a lucky son who has you for his mum,” and Sophie Choudry penned, “Aww the pics. Happy bday @iamarhaankhan .. Biggest hug.”
Speaking of Arhaan Khan, he recently hosted a six-part podcast titled Dumb Biryani with his friends Dev Raiyani and Arush Verma. The podcast featured guests like both his parents, Arbaaz Khan and Malaika Arora, along with Sohail Khan and the social media sensation Orhan Awatramani, aka Orry, among others.
In other news, Malaika Arora, who was previously married to Arbaaz Khan for almost two decades, parted ways with him in 2017. She then got into a relationship with Bollywood actor Arjun Kapoor. Initially, the couple kept their relationship under wraps but later launched it through Instagram. Arjun and Malaika dated for nearly six years before parting ways just recently.
The Singham Again actor confirmed their breakup while he was attending a Diwali party. He revealed that he had been single. While Arjun has spoken about the breakup, Malaika has refrained from sharing anything about the same. However, her cryptic Instagram posts since the confirmation of their breakup have caught people’s attention.
summary: Malaika Arora shared a series of unseen pictures to wish her 'baby boy' on his 22nd birthday.
author: News18,Sahas,Shreyanka Mazumdar

title: Rohit Shetty reveals THIS character from his cop universe is his favorite and it’s not Ajay Devgn’s Singham: ‘Jab humne final…’
text:
Rohit Shetty is in the spotlight for all the right reasons! His latest release, Singham Again, has been showered with praise from fans everywhere. But it’s not just Singham Again—his entire cop universe has been a hit. Recently, he revealed his favorite character from this world, and it’s none other than Ranveer Singh’s Simmba. He also revealed that he knew Simmba was going to rock when he saw the final edit, saying it was evident the film would take things to another level.

Yes, you read that right! In an interview with Mashable India, Rohit Shetty shared his thoughts on Simmba and said, "I think the most lovable is Simmba." (I think Simmba is the most lovable). 

When it was mentioned that Simmba was a crack, he replied, "Aesa nahi hai ki it was a surprise for us. Jab hum ne final edit bhi dekha toh it was like jab second hald Simmba aayega toh film alag level pe chalega. (We knew that. It wasn’t a surprise for us. When we saw the final edit, we knew that once the second half of Simmba kicked in, the film would take things to another level)." 

It was then pointed out that Ranveer Singh got all the best lines in Simmba, Rohit Shetty chuckled and added, "Woh mera thoda favorite bhi hai. (It's actually my little favorite too)." 

In a recent exclusive interview with Pinkvilla, Rohit Shetty addressed fan questions, including one from a Simmba enthusiast asking if a sequel or a Simmba appearance in the Golmaal universe was on the cards. Laughing, the director joked, "That will become too much. Mere pe taras khao. (Have mercy on me). This universe coming here, that universe going there. Simmba will happen, obviously; it’s one of the most loved characters in the cop universe.”

He went on to say, “But as I said, we’ll concentrate on comedy first and then come back to it, because constantly making cop films since Simmba in 2018 might be too much for the audience as well." 

Simmba, directed by Rohit Shetty, stars Ranveer Singh as Sangram Bhalerao, a police officer with a questionable moral compass who is transformed after a life-changing event. Paired with Sara Ali Khan, the film combines thrilling action sequences with a deep dive into moral conflicts.

title: In Pics: Actress Anasuya Celebrates Son Ayansh’s Birthday With A 'Cute Collage' Of Theirs
text:
Despite being a wife and mother of two, Anasuya exudes a youthful charm. Known for her radiant smile, this talented actress is actively exploring new opportunities in Telugu cinema. Her photoshoots, which showcase her fresh and vibrant appeal, frequently go viral, capturing the attention of fans and media alike.
Gaining recognition in the film industry is no easy feat. Regardless of one’s beauty, opportunities to play lead roles, character roles, or even perform in songs can be rare and hard to come by. However, in the case of Anasuya, things seem to be going in the opposite direction. Her career has been marked by a unique trajectory where she stands out and captures roles that others might struggle to secure.
Her journey in entertainment began with an opportunity to work as a news presenter on SakshiTV. From there, she ventured into hosting and presenting across various platforms. She went on to anchor shows on Maa Music and later became the host of the popular comedy show Jabardasth in 2013. This role brought her significant fame, paving the way for her film debut alongside Nagarjuna Akkineni in Soggade Chinni Nayana (2016).
Anasuya has been happily married to Susank Bharadwaj since 2010, and together they have two children. She often shares glimpses of her family life, personal moments, and experiences on her Instagram, where her posts are adored by her fans. Her candid updates and heartwarming family photos have made her social media a favourite among her followers, who appreciate the insight into her life beyond the screen.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Anasuya Bharadwaj (@itsme_anasuya)

Anasuya recently shared a heartfelt series of black-and-white photos on her Instagram, capturing cherished moments with her son Ayansh Bharadwaj. In honour of Ayansh’s birthday, she posted a collection of images that beautifully traced his journey from a little boy to the young man he is today. Among these was a particularly touching photo of her kissing him as a baby, a memory that resonated deeply with her followers. The nostalgic tribute caught netizens by surprise, evoking a flood of warmth, affection, and fond memories across social media.
summary: Anasuya Bharadwaj is a prominent Indian actress, television host, and presenter primarily associated with the Telugu film and television industry.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Young Travis Kelce fan receives heartwarming surprise from Taylor Swift
text: A heartwarming story of a young boy's unwavering admiration for a sports star has captured the hearts of many. Josiah Medler, a six-year-old from Illinois, who has overcome numerous health challenges, is not just a football fan but also a devoted follower of Taylor Swift. Medler's love for the Kansas City Chiefs, particularly tight end Travis Kelce, is well-known. This admiration extends to Kelce's girlfriend, Taylor Swift, making the young boy a Swiftie as well.Also Read: Christian McCaffrey excited for 49ers season debut against Buccaneers, leaving ‘Tough’ time behindTravis Kelce’s young fan gets special surprise from Taylor SwiftJosiah Medler, a brave young boy who had undergone four open-heart surgeries, became an unwavering supporter of Kelce and the Chiefs. His love for Kelce naturally led him to become a "Swiftie," a fan of Swift, who happens to be the tight end’s girlfriend.To mark Josiah's 6th birthday, Keller & Keller Law Firm arranged a jaw-dropping surprise—a ticket to one of Taylor Swift’s iconic Eras Tour concerts at Lucas Oil Stadium. As reported by KCTV5, the little fan, clad in Kelce’s red jersey with his signature number 87, a cap, and an arm full of friendship bracelets, immersed himself in every moment of the concert, his excitement palpable.— KCTV5 (@KCTV5) This wasn’t the first time Josiah’s dreams had been realized. In October 2023, a viral TikTok video showed him in full Chiefs gear, dedicating his passion to the three-time Super Bowl champion. “This video is for you, Trav,” Josiah said, sending a heartfelt message to his idol.The video struck a chord with Chiefs fans, leading to an outpouring of support. A group of dedicated followers of the team gifted Josiah’s family with tickets to a Chiefs game, making the young fan's dream of seeing his heroes play live at GEHA Field at Arrowhead Stadium against the New Orleans Saints come true.The emotional journey of Josiah Medler is a testament to the power of fandom, the kindness of strangers, and the unexpected ways dreams can come true. From open-heart surgeries to stadium lights, Josiah’s story is one of resilience and the special bond between a young fan and his favorite players, both on and off the field.Also Read: Chiefs’ Patrick Mahomes details what makes DeAndre Hopkins a special player and easy to connect with
summary: Josiah Medler, a young boy from Illinois, is a huge fan of Travis Kelce. Josiah's love for Kelce led him to become a fan of Taylor Swift. For his sixth birthday, Josiah received tickets to a Taylor Swift concert.  In 2023, a video of Josiah went viral, leading to him receiving tickets to a Chiefs game.
author: Toi Sports Desk

title: Kaun Banega Crorepati 16: Vikrant Massey's Life Story Prompts Amitabh Bachchan To Say 'Wah'
text:
The latest episode of Kaun Banega Crorepati 16 saw IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and actor Vikrant Massey take the hot seat, sharing intriguing stories about their life. Vikrant played Manoj in the film 12th Fail, released last year. The episode began with Manoj highlighting the impact of the Amitabh Bachchan-hosted show on his life. Later, Vikrant was seen talking about his early life and struggle during childhood, prompting a reaction from the superstar who was visibly impressed with the actor’s zeal and approach towards problems and their solutions.
In the clip shared by Sony Entertainment Television on Instagram, Vikrant Massey is seen telling Amitabh Bachchan, “I turned 37, but I have been working for 20-21 years professionally, sir.” “When I turned 17 years old and found my dad a little tired, and that the burden was increasing, I thought I have to take little responsibility. We used to stay in a one-room kitchen, one-bedroom hall. One day, papa said, ‘Let’s go for a walk’. When we went downstairs, it was the first time we spoke openly. Then I felt that it was the time in life for role reversal,” the actor continued.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sony Entertainment Television (@sonytvofficial)

Proceeding further, Vikrant Massey revealed why he decided to take on Manoj’s character in 12th Fail. He added, “That incident and what Manoj sir went through with his father in atta chakki (wheat grinder) is something that actually made me believe that now, this story has to be told. And only I’ll tell the story.” Amitabh Bachchan who was visibly moved by the anecdote, praised Vikrant Maasey saying, “Wah. Bahut khoob (Wow. That’s amazing).”
Speaking of 12th Fail, the film was directed by Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Based on the life of IPS Officer Manoj, the film depicts how he navigated through different challenges to become an Indian Police Service officer. The film also stars Medha Shankr, Anant V Joshi, Anshumaan Pushkar and Priyanshu Chatterjee in lead roles.
Fans can next see Vikrant Massey in The Sabarmati Report, directed by Dheeraj Sarna and produced by Shobha Kapoor, Ektaa R Kapoor, Amul V Mohan and Anshul Mohan. Besides Vikrant, the film features Raashii Khanna and Riddhi Dogra in important roles. It is scheduled to be released in theatres on November 15.
summary: Vikrant Massey was seen talking about his early life and struggle during childhood, prompting a reaction from Amitabh Bachchan.
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18,Sahas

title: Amitabh Bachchan Recalls Getting Scolded By Vidhu Vinod Chopra On Eklavya Set
text:
Amitabh Bachchan and Vidhu Vinod Chopra can be considered the stalwarts of the Indian film industry. Despite having worked together in the film Eklavya: The Royal Guard, the two had their own share of clashes, including a scolding that Big B faced from the film producer. Vidhu Vinod Chopra, who is otherwise known for his temperament and disciplinary working style, once got furious with Amitabh Bachchan and ended up scolding him on the sets of Eklavya. In the latest of Kaun Banega Crorepati 16, the Kalki 2898 AD actor spilled the beans from his shooting days when he got schooled.
Actor Vikrant Massey appeared on the show with IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma when he got into an interesting conversation about his 12th Fail director. During this time, Big B shared how the filmmaker is a tough taskmaker, recalling that Chopra got angry for a 10-minute delay, despite having worked till 3 AM the previous night. “We worked till 2-3 AM in the night. When we left, he asked me to come back by 6 AM in the morning. I was like, ‘Have you gone mad? You are wrapping up late at night and asking me to come at 6. How is it possible?’ So, I eventually reached the sets at around 6:10 AM, and he ended up scolding me in front of the entire unit. He yelled at me, ‘You are 10 minutes late.’ He is so immersed and passionate about his work,” the actor recalled.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sony Entertainment Television (@sonytvofficial)

Massey also shared his feelings about working with the film producer, stating it was the “best experience” for him. He revealed a few anecdotes, showcasing how Chopra remained dedicated to his work while filming 12th Fail, also stating that he gave bonuses to all the unit members.
This is not the only time when Chopra and Big B had a minor conflict. Earlier in a conversation with Siddharth Kanan, Vidhu Vinod Chopra revealed a fight with Amitabh Bachchan on the sets of Eklavya. Despite this fact, Chopra later gifted a Rolls Royce car to the actor for “tolerating him” and completing the film efficiently.
summary: On the latest episode of KBC 16, Vikrant Massey and Amitabh Bachchan exchanged their personal experiences of working with Vidhu Vinod Chopra.
author: News18,Sahas,Shreyanka Mazumdar

title: Anil Kapoor Shares A Heartfelt Birthday Wish For Son Harshvarrdhan, Praises His 'Strength And Resilience'
text:
Actor Harshvarrdhan Kapoor is celebrating his 33rd birthday today. As he turned a year older, his father Anil Kapoor took to his social media to share a warm birthday wish. He shared a series of pictures of Harshvarrdhan and wished him on his special day.
Taking to his Instagram, Anil Kapoor shared a series of pictures of Harshvarrdhan Kapoor and wished him on his birthday. The first picture showed Harshvarrdhan lying on a field wearing a white t-shirt and a cap. The second picture showed him exuding glamour as he donned a white blazer over a relaxed t-shirt and pants. The third picture showed his impeccable street style, while the fourth picture also featured Anil as they dazzled in sharp black tuxedos.
Sharing these pictures, Anil wrote, “Happy Birthday, Harsh! Watching you grow into the passionate and determined person you are today has been one of my greatest joys. Your strength, resilience, and the way you fearlessly chase your dreams scare me sometimes momentarily, and then when you prove me wrong it makes me proud …Keep forging your own path, no matter where it leads—you’ve already shown us all what it means to truly follow your heart. Here’s to another year of adventures, growth, and madness.”
Take a look at the heartfelt post shared by Anil Kapoor here.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by anilskapoor (@anilskapoor)

As the post went viral, fans took to the comment section to wish Harshvarrdhan on his birthday. Not just fans, but celebrities also extended their wishes. Chunky Panday said, “Happy Happy Birthday.” Anupam Kher wrote, “Happy Birthday Harsh! Love and prayers always.” Milap Zaveri mentioned, “A very happy birthday to @harshvarrdhankapoor.” Rajeev Masand commented, “Happy Birthday @harshvarrdhankapoor.” Sister Rhea Kapoor took to her Instagram Stories to wish him on his birthday.
Harshvarrdhan made his debut in 2016 with Mirzya. He was recently seen in Thar where he shared the screen with his father Anil.
summary: Anil Kapoor shared a birthday wish for his son Harshvarrdhan Kapoor on his 33rd birthday. He talked about how watching him grow has been one of his 'greatest joys.'
author: News18,Snigdha Oreya

title: Suresh Gopi's Wife Radhika Nair To Make Her Debut As A Singer With This Film
text:
Malayalam actor Suresh Gopi is a force to be reckoned with in the regional cinema. Now, his wife Radhika Nair has also made her debut as a singer in the entertainment industry. She has rendered her vocals to a song in an untitled film directed by Jagan Shaji Kailas. This song was recorded recently in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. Manu Manjith penned the lyrics for this track, composed by Ranjin Raj. In an interview with a portal, Radhika Nair said that this film will cater to the family audience. The singer said that this is the first time that she is displaying her talent as an artist in mainstream cinema. She further said that as a singer, her experience is limited only to school performances. Radhika also added that it was her best friend and actress Annie who inspired her to rekindle her childhood passion for music. In this film, Renji Panicker, Siju Wilson and Sreejith Ravi will reportedly play important roles. As per reports, the first schedule of this project was shot in Palakkad, Kerala. 
Radhika has been married to Suresh Gopi in an arranged marriage setup since February 8, 1990. They are the parents of 4 children – Gokul, Bhagya, Bhavini, and Madhav. They also had another girl named Lakshmi, but she died in a road accident. In an earlier interview, Radhika talked about her late daughter. She said, “We have never forgotten her,” says Radhika. “Lakshmi will always be there permanently in our hearts, even though we have four children now.”
Suresh Gopi has been serving as the Minister of Tourism and the Minister of State for Petroleum and Natural Gas since June 2024. He was elected as a Member of Parliament (Lok Sabha) in the 2024 general elections from the Thrissur Lok Sabha constituency. He has now become the first BJP (Bharatiya Janata Party) MP from Kerala. He has acted in more than 250 films to date. He won the National Film Award for Best Actor. He also got the Kerala State Film Award for Best Actor for his performance in Kaliyattam in 1998.
summary: In an interview with a portal, Radhika Nair said that this film will cater to the family audience.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Shraddha Das debuts as singer in Kanguva, earns fan praise
text: Actor Shraddha Das, known for her captivating on-screen presence, has now stepped into playback singing, expanding her talents beyond acting. Fans have enjoyed her performances in films like Arya 2 and PSV Garuda Vega, and now they get to experience her voice in a new way.Das makes her singing debut in the peppy track "Yolo’s" from the upcoming pan-India film Kanguva, starring Suriya, Disha Patani, and Bobby Deol, set for worldwide release on November 14, 2024. The period drama has already stirred excitement, and the song, featuring Das, Suriya, and Patani, has added to the buzz."Yolo’s," composed by Devi Sri Prasad with lyrics by Rakendu Mouli, has garnered millions of views on YouTube. title: When Deepika Padukone beat Ranbir Kapoor at box office
text:
Mumbai: Deepika Padukone's “Om Shanti Om” clashed with Ranbir Kapoor’s debut film “Saawariya” at the box office on November 9, 2007.

Farah Khan’s directorial outperformed Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s romantic drama, with “Om Shanti Om” grossing Rs 152 crore worldwide, while “Saawariya” earned a modest Rs 39.22 crore. As both films mark 17 years since their release today, we recall how Indian cinema witnessed one of its biggest box office clashes, with Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone’s film releasing alongside Ranbir and Sonam Kapoor’s “Saawariya.”

Both films were highly anticipated for different reasons. “Om Shanti Om” benefited from the undeniable star power of SRK, while “Saawariya” attracted attention for being directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Based on Fyodor Dostoevsky's 1848 short story “White Nights”, the film also marked the Bollywood debut of Rishi Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor’s son, Ranbir.

While “Om Shanti Om”, Deepika's first Hindi release, went on to become the highest-grossing Bollywood film at the time, surpassing “Dhoom 2”, “Saawariya” failed to make a mark at the box office.

Made on a budget of Rs. 40 crore, Deepika led romantic drama grossed Rs. 152 crore worldwide, becoming the highest-grossing Hindi film of 2007 and the highest-grossing Hindi film ever at the time of its release.

In contrast, “Saawariya” was a commercial failure. Upon its release, the film received mixed to negative reviews. While the soundtrack, production design, artistic vision, and performances were praised, the story, screenplay, and pacing faced significant criticism. Salman Khan made a cameo as Imaan Pirzada, and the film marked the last appearance of both Zohra Sehgal and Begum Para before their deaths.

Most recently, Deepika’s latest release “Singham Again” clashed with Kartik Aaryan’s horror-comedy “Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3.” Rohit Shetty’s cop drama has surpassed Anees Bazmee’s film at the ticket window. “Singham Again” has become Shetty's 10th film to cross the Rs.100 crore mark, making it the fastest to achieve this milestone.
summary: While “Om Shanti Om”, Deepika's first Hindi release, went on to become the highest-grossing Bollywood film at the time, surpassing “Dhoom 2”, “Saawariya” failed to make a mark at the box office.
author: IANS

title: Kangana Ranaut mourns sad demise of her nani, calls her a ‘remarkable woman’
text:
Mumbai: Kangana Ranaut recently took to social media to mourn the sad demise of her nani Indrani Thakur, who was more than 100 years-old.

On Saturday, the actress revealed that the whole family is grieving the loss of her beloved grandmother, who played a significant role in her life. Kangana posted an unseen photo of her sitting with her Nani and wrote, “Last night, my grandmother Indrani Thakur Ji passed away. The whole family is in mourning. Please pray for her.”

In her next-follow up post, Ranaut reminisced about how her Nani had tirelessly worked to ensure that her daughters were not only educated but were empowered to pursue successful careers after marriage.

She wrote, “My Nani was a remarkable woman, she had 5 children. Nana ji had limited resources, yet she made sure all of her children got high education in good institutions, and she insisted that even her married daughters should work and have a careers of their own; even her daughters got government jobs a rare feat in those days, all of her 5 children, including women, had their own careers, she was very proud of her children careers.”

The 'Tanu Weds Manu' actress went on to add, “We owe so much to our nani ji, she was 5 feet 8 inches tall, very rare for a mountain woman, I got her height and her health and metabolism. My Nani ji was so healthy and lively that even though she was above 100 years old she did all her work by herself.”

The images depicted her Kangana laughing and sharing precious moments with her grandmother, whose wisdom had left an indelible mark on her life.

On the professional front, Ranaut will next be seen in the upcoming biopic “Emergency” where she essays the role of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi. The film is Kangana’s second directorial effort after "Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi."
summary: On Saturday, the actress revealed that the whole family is grieving the loss of her beloved grandmother, who played a significant role in her life. Kangana posted an unseen photo of her sitting with her Nani and wrote, “Last night, my grandmother Indrani Thakur Ji passed away. The whole family is in mourning. Please pray for her.”
author: IANS

title: Kagurabachi Chapter 57 Spoilers: Kumeyori Blade Switches Hands As Rokuhira Traitor Revealed; DEETS
text:
The last chapter of Kagurabachi revealed more about the Makizumi family and Samura, while Uruha tricked the latter into escaping the battlefield. Hakuri Sazanami then put his life on the line to recover the Tobimune Enchanted Blade for Samura, which the blind swordsman then wielded to eliminate numerous Hishaku assassins.

The Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers reveal the current status of the battlefield at Senkutsuji Temple and the theatre, along with new insights into who likely betrayed the Rokuhiras three years ago. Keep reading for more details and a sneak peek at the upcoming chapter.
Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers

As per the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers, the upcoming chapter will be titled ‘Crumbling.’ The spoilers begin with a shift of focus to a theatre where Hiruhiko is in turmoil upon realizing that the Tobimune blade is no longer under his control.

Meanwhile, back at the Senkutsuji temple, Samura wields the Tobimune Enchanted Blade with precision, cutting down numerous Hishaku assassins. The monks and other witnesses are awed by the blade’s overwhelming power.

During this battle, the Makizumi captain apologizes to Samura, expressing regret that he had to intervene to save them in the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers. Samura, however, credits Hakuri for retrieving the blade.
Despite being drained and losing a significant amount of blood, Hakuri expresses a desire to retrieve Uruha’s blade next. A female Makizumi member advises him against it, emphasizing that the Hishaku forces seem weakened and reassures him that everyone will receive treatment at the next Sanzo location.

Following a brief banter, Samura addresses the Makizumi members about his earlier statement of firing them. Although his tone is lighthearted, the conversation turns solemn when he speaks of the death of Fuura Ryou, a fellow Makizumi member, in the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers.

The female Makizumi assures Samura that Fuura’s sacrifice was meaningful, fulfilling his duty to protect him. Back at the theatre, where Hiruhiko is lamenting his failure to reclaim the Tobimune. However, he quickly regains his composure, acknowledging that although their plan has deviated, the overall objective remains unchanged.
Yura’s desire to kill the Sword Saint to wield the Shinuchi blade still stands. In the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers, Chihiro confronts Hiruhiko, asserting that none of the contracted sword bearers will perish under his watch.

Hiruhiko then questions Chihiro about the teachings concerning Enchanted Blades and their wielders. Chihiro recites the common belief that these sword bearers are akin to heroes, equal to the legendary Kunishige.

However, Hiruhiko challenges this notion, implying that Chihiro’s understanding is superficial. Hiruhiko presses further in the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers, asking Chihiro about his observations of the Shinuchi’s powers at the Rakuzaichi auction.
Chihiro admits that witnessing its destructive force made him question whether those wielding such blades were genuinely saviors. He reveals that during his battle with Kyora, who had acquired the Shinuchi blade, it felt as though another entity was awakened by the sword’s powers.

He says he felt as though the true force behind the blade was the Sword Saint, not Kyora. This shakes Chihiro’s beliefs in the Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers, especially when Hiruhiko discloses that three years ago, Samura made a pact with Yura, the Hishaku leader.

According to Hiruhiko, Samura believed that the contracted swordbearers were destined to die. Chihiro is taken aback by this news but has no time to process it as Hiruhiko, without elaborating, uses the distraction to launch a surprise attack.
A blade falls from the sky, diverting Chihiro’s attention. In a swift move, Hiruhiko uses his mouth to pick up his severed arm and hurl it at Chihiro. The Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers then see something burst through the theatre’s window.

Initially, Chihiro believes it to be reinforcements, but he quickly realizes that it is Hiruhiko, now wielding the Kumeyuri blade. The Kagurabachi Chapter 57 spoilers conclude with two ethereal Geisha figures manifesting from the Kumeyuri blade, as Chihiro realizes something must have happened to Uruha, the blade’s contractor.

For more spoilers like this and updates on the events within the Kagurabachi manga, keep up with Pinkvilla.

summary:

title: Oshi No Ko Chapter 166: Last Chapter Of Series To See Ruby Continue Being An Idol; Release Date And More Details
text:
The last chapter of Oshi No Ko Chapter exposed how Hikaru Kamiki not only manipulated Niino and Ryosuke but others as well to carry out crimes on his behalf. At Aqua’s funeral, Kana Arima collapsed as she expressed her deep love for him, while Ruby struggled with depression upon learning of her brother’s passing.

With the manga’s final chapter set to release next week, readers can expect a smooth conclusion without unexpected delays. Don’t miss Oshi No Ko Chapter 166 as it releases, and keep reading to find out when it’s out, the expected plot, and more details.
Oshi No Ko Chapter 166: Release date and where to read

Oshi No Ko Chapter 166 is scheduled for release on Thursday, November 14, 2024, at 12 am JST, marking the manga’s conclusion. Internationally, this translates to a daytime release on Wednesday, November 13, though the exact time will vary by individual location and time zone.

Fans can visit Shueisha's MANGAPlus service to read the latest chapter. The MANGAPlus platform allows readers to access the first three and the latest three chapters of any manga for free. The hard copy of Oshi No Ko Chapter 166 will be released in Weekly Young Jump 2024 #50.
Expected plot in Oshi No Ko Chapter 166

Oshi No Ko Chapter 166 will likely explore Ruby Hoshino and Kana Arima’s journey back to their careers after the emotional turmoil caused by Aqua’s death. Both characters were left deeply affected, with Ruby secluding herself and Kana emotionally shattered.

However, the previous chapter hinted at their hidden strength, suggesting their return to the spotlight is imminent. Oshi No Ko Chapter 166, as the last chapter of the series, may focus on their attempts to rebuild their lives.

This likely entails Ruby resuming her idol activities and Kana finding her footing again in the entertainment industry. There is also the possibility of a time skip, revealing Ruby’s evolution as an idol and her growth as a person as she attempts to carry on Aqua's legacy.
Oshi No Ko Chapter 165 recap

Oshi No Ko Chapter 165, titled ‘And Then,’ began as Akane thought about the aftermath of Aqua and Hikaru’s deaths. Nino turns herself in, leading to a broader investigation that uncovers more proxy murders linked to Hikaru, though no direct evidence incriminating him is found.

Akane reveals her original intention to act as a decoy, but she believes Aqua would have never allowed her to risk herself. She laments Aqua's decision not to leave a farewell note, imagining his reasoning that it would have raised suspicions yet she feels it would have provided closure, especially for Kana.

Aqua’s funeral sees a large turnout in Oshi No Ko Chapter 165, including colleagues from Sweet Today, LoveforReal, Tokyo Blade, and The 15 Year Lie, alongside his classmates from Youtou High. During the open-casket ceremony, Kana shockingly slaps Aqua's corpse.
https://twitter.com/badrulmohd_007/status/1854216605498237140She states that she was fulfilling a promise before breaking down in tears, regretting never confessing her feelings. Akane pulls her away as Miyako reprimands her. Despite concerns, Gotanda and Kaburagi push for the release of The 15-Year Lie.

The movie ends up garnering critical acclaim, becoming the sixth most-watched film of the year. Meanwhile, Ruby isolates herself, devastated, but Akane believes that both Ruby and Kana possess the strength to move forward in Oshi No Ko Chapter 165, just as Aqua had foreseen.

For more updates on the Oshi No Ko series and other works by Aka Akasaka, keep up with Pinkvilla.

title: 'Nayanthara: Beyond The Fairytale': Teaser reveals the sweetest side of the Lady Superstar
text: The excitement continues to build gradually as people await the release of the official teaser for the documentary film, Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale. Netflix has released the trailer of the series today and it gives us a glimpse of how Nayanthara has established herself as a prominent star in the cinema industry all of Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, and Bollywood markets. The former achieved a lot of success in the Indian cinema industry and married Vignesh Shivan after becoming an iconic popular figure. Netflix made an announcement with this poster saying, "A personal tale of the superstar's truth, her family, and her life beyond stardom. Nayanthara: Beyond The Fairytale, trailer out tomorrow!" The announcement further fuels the anticipation surrounding the documentary, in which her family life is sure to be explored along with the events leading her to become a celebrity in the industry. The teaser of the series looks absolutely great and it shows the journey of Nayanthara turning into the Lady Superstar she is. The documentary series features Nayanthara and her director husband, Vignesh Shivan, sharing their journey from being actor-directors to their relationship until marriage. Also featuring their family, especially their adorable twin babies. We also get to see actors like Nagarjuna, Rana Daggubati, Upendra, Atlee, and many others talk about their relationship with her. Fans were left wanting more after the release of the first teaser in September 2022 as they sought insight into the life of the actor and her filmmaker spouse, Vignesh Shivan. The two wed in June 2022 and have since become a beloved couple, and Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale illuminates the development of the couple from their courtship to their current stage of starting a family. The filmmakers detailed their style quite well, 'We wanted the audience to see the path how these two found each other and how they are there for each other and what all they are going to do in future. It's not just a wedding narrative - it's a love story and unity with the focus on life building.' Nayanthara, Beyond the Fairytale made the audience interested in showing more than just a figure of a celebrity. Everyone will love this woman because the documentary will highlight the strength and elegance of the actress through personal stories and behind-the-scenes footage. This is not only a tale of a celebrity; it is also a tale of a woman, a spouse, and eventually a mother who is carving out a niche for herself in the world and on the screen.
summary: Nayanthara, Beyond the Fairytale made the audience interested in showing more than just a figure of a celebrity. Everyone will love this woman because the documentary will highlight the strength and elegance of the actress through personal stories and behind-the-scenes footage.
