title: Why Kamala Harris lost despite Taylor Swift endorsement
text: Taylor Swift means business, we know that. And Kamala Harris also knew that. Thus getting Swift's support was itself a big boost to her team. Swift has a loyal fan base, they call it "Swifties." They are young and energetic. So, it usually comes to mind that their idol's discourse would influence them. But what happened? Has Taylor Swift's endorsement actually affected the US election as the candidate she has given support to got beaten by Donald Trump.Celebrity endorsement history in US electionUsing or bringing celebrities to support the candidates have been a common practice in US election's history. In the light of a recent presidential debate, the globally acclaimed musician Taylor Swift followed this tradition when she voiced her support for Kamala Harris, the Democratic candidate. But Harris lost the election. This now definitely brings questions regarding the actual impact on voter turnout and eventual election outcomes that celebrity endorsements have.Her call to action produced a vigorous response, as 10.4 million "likes" piled up. In fact, a US government official said that the website vote.gov got 405,999 unique visitors in the 24 hours after Swift's pushed to send her followers there.Swift's action helps highlight a longer-running question: how much clout do celebrities actually have when they endorse political candidates? Historical data is very mixed on how well endorsements work. For instance, Oprah Winfrey's 2008 endorsement of Barack Obama allegedly added at least a million votes to his campaign. However, a 2007 Pew Research Center poll indicated that 69% of people said Oprah's endorsement had no effect on how they voted and only 23% of Democrats said her support made them more likely to vote for Obama.On the other hand, a 2010 study conducted by North Carolina State University maintained that celebrity endorsements, be it from George Clooney or Angelina Jolie, did little to change the minds of voters. It simply means that while celebrities can trigger a debate and even grab media attention, that does not make them the potential game changers in bringing about a sea change in political results.Also Read: Rookie NFL player says Mom's support was key to getting ready for his first gameTaylor Swift’s star power did not workPast political endorsements by Taylor Swift have met mixed success. In 2018, she came out in support of Democrat Phil Bredesen for the Tennessee Senate seat in a historically Republican state, where Swift has lived since she was 14. Again, via Instagram, she asked her followers to vote. Immediately afterwards, Vote.org reported a remarkable increase in voter registration: 65,000 new registrations within 24 hours, and another 250,000 over the following three days. But irrespective of all this noise, Bredesen did eventually lose the race. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WI9fbbQ-aToWhich begs the question as to any more lingering impacts of Swift's endorsements. The general tendency of younger voters not to vote as much as those in older age brackets may result in their being motivated and registering themselves for voting. This may be especially true if they had been inspired by some celebrity figure such as Swift. It is difficult to know how many such registrations were a result of the artist's endorsement. Interestingly, a survey taken in Tennessee by the Beacon Center-a free-market think tank-showed that 81 percent of the people polled said an endorsement by Swift would not influence their vote. Just 12 percent would be more likely to vote for the candidate Swift preferred, while 5 percent said they would be less likely to vote for them.Interestingly, Kamala Harris lost in Taylor Swift’s home state to Trump where there are a total 19 electoral votes.We can see, Swift may be popular, but her endorsement and the huge fan following did not bring the result to Harris as she would have expected. Where celebrity endorsements, such as by Taylor Swift, stir enormous media interest and add to voter engagement, most of the actual effects are usually impossible to take into account in election results. Swift's previous endorsements have seen mixed results, and her support for Kamala Harris also turned out to be a failure. There is no surefire formula for success, and bringing a superstar does not give you the guarantee of coming victorious. And, Kamala Harris surely knows this by now– she has got most of the celebrities behind her.
summary: Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris sparked debate about the influence of celebrities in elections. Despite Swift's massive following and efforts to mobilize young voters, Harris lost the election. Historical data shows mixed results for celebrity endorsements, with some studies suggesting limited impact on voter decisions.
author: Toi World Desk

title: Fabulous Lives Vs Bollywood Wives: Shalini Passi Claims Riddhima Kapoor And Kalyani 'Ganged Up' Against Her
text:
Since its release on Netflix, Fabulous Lives vs. Bollywood Wives has captured the attention of fans with its thrilling mix of luxury, drama and star-studded moments. Across the eight-episode season, viewers were treated to intense confrontations, lavish parties, and unforgettable scenes. Among the new cast, Shalini Passi emerged as a standout. However, a recent accusation by Shalini against fellow stars Riddhima Kapoor Sahni and Kalyani Saha Chawla has left fans in suspense.
In a video shared from a recent virtual chat between the 7 cast of the show along with ace filmmaker Karan Johar, Shalini can be heard accusing Riddhima and Kalyani of “ganging up” against her. The discussion began when Karan asked Riddhima and Kalyani if they felt that Shalini was holding some kind of resentment towards them. In response, Kalyani mentioned that she treats Shalini like her real sister. However, she felt the art curator was a bit “miffed” with them. Kalyani stated, “I said it into the camera; I said Shalini is like my real sister. I will always tell her off.”
On the other hand, Riddhima opined that if there were any resentments from Shalini’s side, she would appreciate it if the latter had opened up about them. Neetu Kapoor’s daughter said, “Like, I say things to your face. If at all I have genuinely made a mistake, I will tell you about it.” But Shalini made a cancelling action, making Karan say, “Shalini is cancelling you for some reason.”
Soon, Shalini opened up, saying, “I’m saying cancel. Why should anybody say anything to me?” To this, Riddhima asked, “What is the resentment for then?” Shalini then explained her point of view and made strong accusations on Riddhima and Kalyani. Shalini replied, “The thing is, you don’t gang up against your team member. I felt like you guys had ganged up. I was relying on you for a lot of things, but I felt…”
Riddhima interrupted, “But Shalini, you say you don’t want us to tell you. You don’t want any advice. You are okay. You shut us out, and then you say,’ We are here telling you, ‘Listen, if you think that they are putting you in a spot’.”
Shalini then shared, “Your apologies came the next night,” pointing towards the incident that happened on the first night of their tour to Mauritius. For context, on that day, Riddhima mistakenly spilled her drink on Shalini’s clothes while they were enjoying their meal. However, Riddhima didn’t apologise to Shalini right at the moment, making it a topic of discussion amongst the other cast.
Listening to Shalini, Riddhima added, “They were not talking about my apology. The day after that.” Karan intervened in the conversation and tried to make it light-hearted. He said, “I think, may I intercept by trying to be the voice of reason here and say that the idea I think of this was that we put out our feelings and also accept…”
However, Shalini mentioned, “Yeah, I accept. I didn’t want to bring up this. This is too new for me. I need time.” Karan continued, “Both Kalyani and Riddhima have expressed their love for you. And Riddhima rightfully says that you are not the best of friends and may never be.”
As the video neared its end, Maheep Kapoor lightened the mood with a humorous comment, “I feel like we’re shooting season four. When does the shoot stop, guys?” Sharing it, Shalini wrote in the caption, “Drama, apologies, and a side of a fabulous reunion. Watch the full video of Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives Reunion on Netflix India YouTube Channel.”

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Shalini Passi (@shalini.passi)

Fabulous Lives Vs Bollywood Wives premiered season three on Netflix on October 18. Three more people were part of the show besides the four gorgeous wives in the industry, including Neelam Kothari, Maheep Kapoor, Bhavana Pandey, and Seema Kiran Sajdeh. The latest season was based on the theme of Mumbai Vs Delhi. Neetu Kapoor’s daughter, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, art curator Shalini Passi and another Delhi socialite, Kalyani Saha Chawla, were from the Delhi side.
summary: This recent accusation by Shalini against fellow stars Riddhima Kapoor Sahni and Kalyani Saha Chawla has left fans surprised.
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18,Sahas

title: Michael Jackson Biopic's Release Date Pushed Back To October Next Year
text:
The highly anticipated biopic about legendary pop icon Michael Jackson titled Michael will now be released in theaters on October 3, 2025. The announcement was made on Tuesday by Lionsgate, the film’s distributor. The release date has been pushed back by six months from the original schedule of April 18, 2025. Directed by Antoine Fuqua, the movie will star Jaafar Jackson, the late singer’s nephew, in the role of the King of Pop. Alongside him, the film will feature Nia Long, Laura Harrier, Miles Teller and Colman Domingo. The script for the biopic has been written by John Logan. The project is produced by Graham King, John Branca and John McClain.
Michael will offer a glimpse into the powerful narrative of Michael Jackson’s life, promising a “riveting and honest portrayal of the brilliant yet complicated man who became the King of Pop.” According to the official synopsis, it will depict his “triumphs and tragedies on an epic, cinematic scale,” from his personal struggles to his “undeniable creative genius, exemplified by his most iconic performances.” The synonsis adds, “As never before, audiences will experience an inside look into one of the most influential, trailblazing artists the world has ever known.”
During a panel at San Diego Comic-Con in July, Fuqua shared updates on the progress of Michael, revealing that the film was in the editing stage at the time. Fuqua also explained his motivation for making the film, saying, “Michael was a big part of my life growing up, a big influence on my career, an incredible artist — but he was a human being, and we’re exploring that. I’m very excited about it.”
At CinemaCon in April, Graham King unveiled the first trailer for Michael. The footage opens with scenes of excited fans and transitions to a young Michael Jackson with his mother telling him, “There might be some people who think you’re different, but you were never like anyone else.” The trailer shows Jaafar delivering electrifying performances on stage as the King of Pop.
King also confirmed that Michael will feature 30 songs and have a long runtime to fully honour Jackson’s legacy. “I’m looking forward to giving the audience a thrill like they’ve never seen before. It is a story worthy of a cinematic presentation. For the first time, fans and generations of moviegoers will come together to get an inside look into the most prolific artist who ever lived,” the co-producer added.
summary: The release date of the late pop icon Michael Jackson's biopic, Michael, has been postponed to next year.

title: Who Is Austin Swift? Everything We Know About Taylor Swift's Brother Who Recently Attended The Chiefs Games With Her
text:
Austin Swift, the younger brother of pop superstar Taylor Swift, has been a constant figure in his sister’s journey to superstardom. Recently, he gained more attention when he joined Taylor at a Kansas City Chiefs game on November 4, 2024, where she was supporting her boyfriend, Travis Kelce.

Fans are eager to know more about Austin, who has mostly stayed out of the spotlight. Here’s a look at everything we know about Taylor Swift’s brother.

Austin Swift was born on March 11, 1992, in West Reading, Pennsylvania, and is two-and-a-half years younger than his famous sister, Taylor. Growing up, the Swift family lived on a Christmas tree farm.

The family eventually moved to Nashville, Tennessee, when Taylor was a teenager so she could pursue a career in country music. Austin, on the other hand, chose a different path that eventually led him to a career in film.

 Austin attended the University of Notre Dame and graduated in 2015 with a bachelor’s degree in film studies. His passion for film was ignited at a young age, and he found comfort in the characters on the big screen during his school years, especially since he didn’t have many friends.

In a 2017 interview with Vanity Fair, Austin shared, “I would go to the movies, and Daniel Craig was my friend, and Christian Bale was my friend, and Clive Owen was my friend, and Viggo Mortensen was my friend.”

After college, Austin pursued acting and landed his first role in the 2016 crime thriller I.T., followed by a role in the Ben Affleck-directed gangster film Live by Night. His acting career continued to grow, and in 2018, he took on his first leading role in the film Cover Versions.

Austin’s most recent acting role was in the 2019 film Braking for Whales. He also ventured into television, making appearances in two episodes of Still the King, a CMT comedy starring Billy Ray Cyrus, as well as in the political comedy Embeds in 2017.

 While Austin did enjoy his time in front of the camera, his true passion extended beyond acting. He became involved in film production, working behind the scenes for his sister Taylor's music videos and projects.

Austin served as a producer on the 2009 music video for Taylor’s hit song You Belong With Me and was credited as an executive producer for her 2011 video for Mean.

In 2020, Austin took on a larger role as an executive producer for Taylor Swift: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions, a special where Taylor performed the songs from her Folklore album in order, offering behind-the-scenes insights into the creative process.

Austin continued his production work, serving as a producer for Taylor’s 2021 music video for I Bet You Think About Me (Taylor’s Version), which was directed by Taylor’s close friend, actress Blake Lively.

Taylor Swift’s lyrics have often paid tribute to her brother. On her 2008 album Fearless, she sings about her brother in the song The Best Day, with the line: "God smiles on my little brother, inside and out, he’s better than I am." Later, on her 2010 album Speak Now, Taylor sings about Austin in the track Never Grow Up, with the lyrics, “All your little brother’s favorite songs.”

ALSO READ: 'A Beautiful, Emotional Journey': Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo Share Insight on Their ‘Wicked’ Set Bond
summary:
While Austin did enjoy his time in front of the camera, his true passion extended beyond acting. He became involved in film production, working behind the scenes for his sister Taylor's music videos and projects.



Austin served as a producer on the 2009 music video for Taylor’s hit song You Belong With Me and was credited as an executive producer for her 2011 video for Mean.



In 2020, Austin took on a larger role as an executive producer for Taylor Swift: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions, a special where Taylor performed the songs from her Folklore album in order, offering behind-the-scenes insights into the creative process.



Austin continued his production work, serving as a producer for Taylor’s 2021 music video for I Bet You Think About Me (Taylor’s Version), which was directed by Taylor’s close friend, actress Blake Lively.

title: Ranbir Kapoor To Yash: Who's Playing What Role In Nitesh Tiwari's Ramayana
text:
Nitesh Tiwari’s Ramayana is one of the most eagerly awaited films and the excitement has only intensified with the recent release of the movie’s first poster. After a long wait, the makers have finally revealed the title and confirmed the release dates for the film which will be split into two parts. The first part is set to release in Diwali 2026, followed by the second part in Diwali 2027. The stunning poster features a golden, magical arrow with the release dates.
In a statement shared along with the poster, Namit wrote, “More than a decade ago, I embarked on a noble quest to bring this epic that has ruled billions of hearts for over 5000 years to the big screen. And today, I am thrilled to see it taking shape beautifully as our teams work tirelessly with only one purpose: to present the most authentic, sacred, and visually stunning adaptation of our history, our truth, and our culture – our “RAMAYANA”– for people across the world. Join us as we fulfill our dream of bringing our greatest epic to life with pride and reverence… Part 1 in Diwali 2026 and Part 2 in Diwali 2027.”
As anticipation builds for the epic movie, here are the full details of the cast and their roles:
Ranbir Kapoor – Lord Ram
Sai Pallavi – Goddess Sita
Yash – Ravana
Sunny Deol – Hanuman
Lara Dutta – Kaikeyi
Sheeba Chaddha – Manthara
The role of Lakshman has not been officially confirmed yet but reports indicate that TV actor Ravi Dubey will portray the character. Reports also suggest that Arun Govil, known for playing Lord Ram in Ramanand Sagar’s Ramayana, will take on the role of King Dashrath in the movie.
Several images of Ranbir and Sai from the Ramayana film set had gone viral, leading the producers to take action. In response, producer Namit Malhotra decided to cover the sets from all angles and move the shooting indoors to prevent further leaks. “The producers didn’t want any glimpses of the film to come out before an official announcement and despite trying their best – including opting for a no-phone policy on set – shutterbugs managed to click pictures of Ranbir and Sai’s looks from the film. Curtains have been put all around and the surveillance has been tightened to avoid further leaks,” a source told News18.
Ramayana Part: I is scheduled for release on Diwali 2026 which falls on November 8, while Ramayana Part: II will be released on Diwali 2027, set for October 28.
summary: Nitesh Tiwari recently shared the poster of his highly-anticipated film Ramayana, starrer Ranbir Kapoor and Sai Pallavi
author: Kashvi Raj Singh,News18,Sahas

title: Neetu Kapoor shares heartwarming moment of Ranbir with daughter Raha on her 2nd birthday
text:
Mumbai: Neetu Kapoor shared an adorable and heartwarming moment of Ranbir Kapoor with his daughter, Raha, as she celebrates her second birthday today.

The proud father is seen planting a sweet kiss on Raha’s cheek. On Wednesday, Neetu shared an adorable photo featuring Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and their baby girl, Raha. In the heartwarming image, Ranbir is seen lovingly kissing Raha on her head, with Alia watching the moment.

Alongside the picture, Neetu wrote, “Our pyaar’s birthday, God bless.” The little birthday girl looks absolutely adorable, sitting between her parents in the car, with her beautiful eyes stealing the spotlight.

Riddhima Kapoor Sahni also shared a lovely picture of Raha, where she is seen posing with Samara. Raha gazes directly at the camera, flashing an adorable smile. Dressed in a white t-shirt with matching pants and white-and-pink sneakers, she looks absolutely cute.

In the picture, Alia’s little girl is seen perched on the window sill, while Samara gazes out the window. Sharing the beautiful moment, Riddhima wished Raha, writing, “Happy happiest bday, my cutie pie! We love you so much.”

Earlier, on the occasion of Diwali, Alia Bhatt gave fans a glimpse into their Diwali celebrations. She posted an adorable photo of Raha performing the aarti with her parents. The family donned coordinated mustard yellow outfits for the occasion.

Alia and Ranbir, who got married on April 14, 2022, welcomed their first child, daughter Raha, on November 6 in the same year. The couple made their first public appearance with daughter Raha in December 2023. They unveiled their daughter's face for the first time on Christmas last year.

Meanwhile, Ranbir Kapoor is all set to play Lord Ram in Nitesh Tiwari’s highly awaited film “Ramayana”, which also stars Sai Pallavi. The makers have set Diwali 2026 and Diwali 2027 as the release dates for “Ramayana Part 1 and Ramayana Part 2.”
summary: The proud father is captured planting a sweet kiss on Raha's cheek. On Wednesday, Neetu shared an adorable photo of Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and their daughter Raha. In the touching image, Ranbir lovingly kisses Raha on the head, while Alia watches the moment.
author: IANS

title: One Piece Chapter 1131 Brief Spoilers Out: Luffy Attacks Loki As Saul Collapses; DEETS
text:
A part of the Straw Hat crew has made it to Elbaph, where they escaped the massive diorama created by Road of Hajrudin’s New Giant Warrior Pirates and got separated from Luffy. With the crew’s captain having stumbled upon the infamous Loki, the Prince of Elbaph, fans have been looking forward to the upcoming chapter to find out what happens next.

Fortunately for eager fans, the One Piece Chapter 1131 brief spoilers have recently been leaked online by reliable leaker Pew (@pewpiece), so don’t miss it! Here’s everything you need to know about the spoilers.
One Piece Chapter 1131 brief spoilers

As per the One Piece Chapter 1131 brief spoilers, the upcoming chapter will be titled ‘Loki in the Underworld.’ The chapter continues the encounter between Luffy and Loki, who remains imprisoned deep within Elbaph’s Underworld.

Locked in Sea Prism Stone chains and under the watchful eye of animal guards, Loki finds himself in a vulnerable yet dangerous position as he converses with Luffy. In an attempt to gain his freedom, Loki promises Luffy that he will eliminate any pirate crew he chooses as a reward.

This offer sparks curiosity in Luffy but also raises questions about the truth of Loki’s intentions and his mysterious power. As the conversation continues, Loki unexpectedly refers to Shanks as a “chicken” in the One Piece Chapter 1131 spoilers.
This insult visibly angers Luffy, who activates his Gear 4th form to strike Loki. Although the effectiveness of the attack is not explicitly detailed in the spoilers, it is implied that Loki’s insult serves as a significant catalyst, increasing the tension between the two.

During this clash, fans also learn that the World Government has placed an immense bounty of 2.6 billion berries on Loki in the One Piece Chapter 1131 spoilers, making it clear the threat he poses despite his current captivity.

Meanwhile, Loki’s words have only heightened Luffy’s interest in understanding the connection between Loki and Shanks. However, Loki refuses to divulge any information unless Luffy agrees to release him from his restraints.
The One Piece Chapter 1131 spoilers leave this interaction unresolved, keeping fans guessing about whether Luffy will ultimately choose to free Loki and risk unleashing a potential new threat on the world. The focus then shifts to Zoro and the group of Straw Hats he was tasked with leading after Luffy separated from them.

The group narrowly avoids a dangerous encounter with Road and a band of pirates. These attackers remain unnamed in the spoilers, but they could be either discontented members of the New Giant Warrior Pirates or Elbaphian locals who disagree with Hajrudin’s alliance with the Straw Hats.

Elsewhere, Robin prepares for a potential reunion with her old friend, Jaguar D. Saul, whom she believed dead until recently. With Brook’s help, Robin cuts her hair back to its pre-time skip style, hoping this appearance will help Saul recognize her if they meet in the One Piece Chapter 1131 spoilers.

This sudden event shocks the onlookers, and the sight of a giant shouting about Saul’s condition brings a tense close to the One Piece Chapter 1131 spoilers. Lastly, there will be no break next week.

title: Shah Rukh Khan's Dil Se co-star Manisha Koirala reveals he wasn't supposed to die in film; here's why script was changed
text:
The 1998 classic Dil Se, directed by Mani Ratnam, remains a fan favorite. Recently, Manisha Koirala revealed an intriguing twist about the film’s original script, where Shah Rukh Khan's character wasn’t initially meant to make the sacrifice seen in the final cut. The ending was altered at the last minute, adding a dramatic shift to the storyline.

In Dil Se, set against the backdrop of insurgency in Assam, Manisha Koirala portrays a female terrorist, a suicide bomber, while SRK’s character ultimately sacrifices his life alongside hers when she attempts to set herself on fire while wearing a bomb. In a recent interview with ANI, Manisha revealed that the original ending of the film was quite different. 

She explained that in the initial script, the cause was more significant than love for both characters, and Shah Rukh Khan’s character was meant to let her die. However, she added, "They changed it last minute."

The Heeramandi actress expressed her preference for the original ending of Dil Se, which she felt emphasized the impossibility of the characters' union. She explained that in the final version, the film focused on showcasing the intensity of SRK's love, where he stops her from dying but ends up sacrificing his life in the process. 

She felt that this change, designed to highlight the sacrifice, deviated from the original script. She said, “Back then only I had liked the original because there was no way they would have become one. Sometimes unrequited love is more interesting than a completed loved story.”

Manisha Koirala also reflected on her decision to take on the complex role in the film, sharing that she had initially been slated to work with Ram Gopal Verma before the offer for Dil Se came her way. Although other actresses were initially considered for the role, she was drawn to it because she wanted to explore new and challenging areas as an artist. 

She also discussed how Mani Ratnam’s vision shaped her portrayal of the character. Instead of playing her in a typical manner, he encouraged her to embody a ‘normal’ girl with deep pain and anger that went beyond reason, adding layers of complexity to the role.

On the professional front, Manisha Koirala was last seen in Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Heeramandi, where her portrayal of Mallikajaan was highly appreciated by audiences. 

The series featured a talented ensemble cast, including Sonakshi Sinha, Aditi Rao Hydari, Richa Chadha, Sanjeeda Sheikh, Sharmin Segal Mehta, and Taha Shah Badussha. Additionally, Manisha shared the screen with Kartik Aaryan in the 2023 film Shehzada.

Meanwhile, Shah Rukh Khan will next be seen in Sujoy Ghosh's action film King, where he stars alongside his daughter Suhana Khan. The movie also features Abhay Verma and Abhishek Bachchan in pivotal roles.

summary:
The 1998 classic Dil Se, directed by Mani Ratnam, remains a fan favorite. Recently, Manisha Koirala revealed an intriguing twist about the film’s original script, where Shah Rukh Khan's character wasn’t initially meant to make the sacrifice seen in the final cut. The ending was altered at the last minute, adding a dramatic shift to the storyline.



In Dil Se, set against the backdrop of insurgency in Assam, Manisha Koirala portrays a female terrorist, a suicide bomber, while SRK’s character ultimately sacrifices his life alongside hers when she attempts to set herself on fire while wearing a bomb. title: Happy Birthday Raha: Neetu, Riddhima Kapoor, Soni Razdan share unseen moments [SEE PICS]
text: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha turns two today. The couple welcomed baby Raha on Novemebr 6, 2022 in Mumbai. As the baby girl turns two, Raha's family, her dadi Neetu Kapoor, aunt (bua) Riddhima Sahani, maasi Shaheen Bhatt, and Nani Soni Razdan dropped unseen pictures with Raha to mark her special day. Raha's grandmother, veteran actress Neetu Kapoor, shared an unseen picture of the little one. In the snap posted on Instagram, Raha was seated in a car with her parents, while Ranbir was kissing the little one's head and Alia was looking at her husband affectionately. Neetu Kapoor wrote, "Our pyaar's birthday. God bless." Neetu Kapoor's daughter, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, also shared a birthday post. Taking to her Instagram stories, Riddhima's daughter, Samara Sahni, and Raha were seen together, sharing a sweet moment. "Happy happiest birthday my cutie pie. We love you so much." Alia Bhatt's elder sister, Shaheen Bhatt, shared a slew of pictures of Raha. In the first image, Raha is seen pulling Shaheen's cheek. The next photo shows Raha's hand as she holds her aunt's finger. Shaheen's caption read, "Raha - my sweet, silly, kind baby girl - everything you touch turns to happiness. I love you more than you will ever know. Happy Birthday my little bean." Nani Soni took to her Instagram and shared a cute picture of Alia holding Raha close to her as they watched monkeys outside the window. The caption read, "No feeling in the world beats being your grandma and having the privilege of capturing precious moments like these for posterity. A part of me wishes that you never grow up. Yet I am delighted to see you do just that! Happy 2nd Birthday to our darling Raha.." As Raha turns two today, Alia Bhatt is yet to post a heartfelt picture with her daugther. Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor's daughter has been an internet sensation ever since her parents officially introduced her to the world. For the unversed, Alia and Ranbir allowed the paparazzi to click Raha on 25th December 2023, on Christmas day.
summary: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor's baby girl Raha Kapoor turns 2 today, November 6, 2024. The couple had their first child in November 2022. Alia Bhatt is yet to post a birthday wish for her daughter on Instagram.
author: Ruchita

title: Inside Aishwarya Arjun’s Dreamy Parisian Holiday
text:
Aishwarya Arjun, daughter of renowned actor Arjun Sarja, made her debut as a leading lady in Kannada cinema with the film Prema Baraha in 2018. Aishwarya, who has worked in both Sandalwood and Kollywood films, has not appeared in any recent movie projects, leading fans to wonder about her career plans. Recently, she was in the spotlight due to rumours and discussions surrounding her marriage, adding to the curiosity about her personal life. Aishwarya Arjun and Tamil actor Umapathy Ramaiah recently tied the knot in a traditional ceremony. The couple exchanged vows in an intimate ceremony at Arjun’s Sri Yoga Anjaneyar Temple in Gerugambakkam, Chennai. Their grand wedding, held just a few months ago, was attended by numerous celebrities and politicians, who extended their heartfelt wishes to the newlyweds. Aishwarya, known for her active presence on social media, frequently shares photos and videos, giving her followers a glimpse into her life and updates about her journey.
Actress Aishwarya Arjun, currently vacationing in Paris, has shared some stunning photos on her Instagram. Her choice to write the title in Kannada delighted many fans, though some netizens playfully pointed out minor misspellings in her post. One follower commented, appreciating her use of Kannada and noting that Paris truly is romantic.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Aishwarya Arjun (@aishwaryaarjun)

Shortly after posting the photo, Aishwarya Arjun quickly corrected the spelling error, updating the caption to accurately read “Paris Romance.” Fans applauded her attentiveness, praising her for promptly fixing the mistake. Many supporters commented that other actresses who seem to have distanced themselves from their Kannada roots could take inspiration from Aishwarya’s pride in the language.
Aishwarya Arjun made her film debut in 2013 with Pattathu Yaanai, where she starred alongside Vishal. She later took on her first leading role in 2018 with the Kannada film Prema Baraha. This movie was also released in Tamil under the title Sollividava, with certain scenes reshot to suit the Tamil audience. Despite the anticipation, the film didn’t achieve the level of success initially expected in either language. Her husband, Umapathy Ramaiah, also has a budding career in cinema. Entering the industry in 2017, he has appeared in just four films so far, but his performances have managed to capture audience attention, gradually building him a fan base in Tamil cinema.
It appears that Umapathy Ramaiah and Aishwarya Arjun had been in love for quite some time before they decided to tie the knot. After receiving a warm approval from their families, the couple happily celebrated their marriage. Now, they are cherishing their new journey together as a married couple.
In 2021, Aishwarya participated in the Survivor reality show hosted by her father, actor Arjun, on Zee Tamil, where Umapathy also appeared. This show became the starting point of their friendship, and it was during this time that Umapathy grew closer to Arjun’s family. Over time, this friendship blossomed into a romantic relationship.
When the two decided to marry, their families met at the Hanuman temple, which was built by Arjun himself, to discuss the marriage plans. Following this, Aishwarya and Umapathy were married on June 10 in a ceremony held at the Hanuman temple in Chennai, surrounded by close friends and family.
summary: Aishwarya Arjun, currently vacationing in Paris, has shared some stunning photos on Instagram.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Malayalam Film Thanupp To Compete In This Category At 55th IFFI Awards
text:
To promote new and young talent in the country, Thanupp is shortlisted at the 55th edition of the International Film Festival of India (IFFI). Directed by Ragesh Narayanan, this is the only film from the Malayalam industry to be on the list. The IFFI 2024 is just around the corner, scheduled to take place in Goa from November 20 to November 28. Thanupp (The Cold) is shortlisted for the Best Debut Director of Indian Feature Film.
Produced by Anu Ananthan and Dr Lakshmi, Thanupp was released at the cinemas on October 4. The film follows the love story between Jibiya and Nidheesh Nambiar. The film explores their story with social commentary. The director of the film is happy that his first film was selected for such recognition. The film is set against the backdrop of a hill village in Kannur.
The music for the film is composed by Bibin Ashok, while the cinematography is handled by Manikandan PS and edited by Safdar Merva. It also stars Kuttikkal Jayachandran, Arun Kumar, Aaru Bala and others.
A total of five films are shortlisted for the award that highlights new perspectives, diverse narratives, and innovative cinematic styles from across India. The International Film Festival will be held in Goa from November 20 to November 28. According to the information from the Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, a jury will evaluate these films during the 55th IFFI and the winner will be announced at the closing ceremony on November 28. The preview committee made the selection of these five films from 117 eligible entries.
Apart from Thanupp, other films shortlisted for the award are Boong, Gharat Ganpati, Mikka Bannada Hakki (Bird of a Different Feather) and Razakar (Silent Genocide of Hyderabad). Each film brings unique narratives and regional perspectives that highlight India’s cultural and linguistic diversity.
This year, the festival focuses on debuting Indian films to promote fresh perspectives in the film industry. With these debut films, the film festival aims to foster a global appreciation for Indian cinema, providing emerging filmmakers with a platform to reach a wider audience.
summary: The International Film Festival of India 2024 is scheduled to take place in Goa from November 20 to November 28.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Chainsaw Man Chapter 183: Flashback To See Aki And Power Return; Release Date, Where To Read, Expected Plot And More
text:
The return of Snow Devil has stirred up memories of Aki Hayakawa and Power for Denji in the last chapter of Chainsaw Man, creating a rather nostalgic reunion for fans as well. Many are eager to witness the reunion of the ‘Hayakawa Family,’ even in the form of a flashback.

Don’t miss Chainsaw Man Chapter 183 to see Denji interact with his cherished family members once more. Keep reading to find out the release date, where to read it, the expected plot and a recap of the last chapter’s events.
Chainsaw Man Chapter 183: Release date and where to read

Chainsaw Man Chapter 183 is scheduled to debut on Wednesday, November 13, 2024, at 12 am JST. For the majority of international readers, this translates to a daytime release on Tuesday, November 12, 2024, in their local time zones. However, keep in mind that the exact release time will vary depending on individual time zones.

Fans can read Chainsaw Man Chapter 183 on Viz Media's official website, Shueisha's MANGAPlus service, or Shueisha's Shonen Jump+ app. The former two platforms offer complimentary access to the initial and most recent three chapters of the series, while the latter requires a subscription for full access to the entire series.
Expected plot in Chainsaw Man Chapter 183

Chainsaw Man Chapter 183 will likely continue where the last chapter left off, as the flashback of the snowy memory of Aki and Power continues. This recollection will likely provide Denji with a moment of healing as he thinks about his connection with his late friends.

Given Aki and Power’s popularity, this flashback may be explored in depth, allowing Denji a chance to rediscover something essential to his identity and purpose. Chainsaw Man Chapter 183 is expected to close by returning to the Aging Devil’s realm, where Denji may find new emotional clarity.
Chainsaw Man Chapter 182 recap

Chainsaw Man Chapter 182, titled ‘Cute,’ begins as Yoru breaks away from her kiss with Denji, advising him that crying won’t help them escape. Denji, puzzled and frustrated, questions her motives for the kiss, to which she responds that his tearful face makes him look cute.

Yoru then kisses him again, but Denji resists, expressing irritation that his life feels like a cycle of misery and lust. He explains that he can’t reflect on his mistakes while distracted by his libido, which leaves him feeling helpless.
https://twitter.com/er__cl/status/1853816697058103727Yoru tries to encourage him by comparing their pasts, sharing that she too lost family but managed to move on, implying he can as well. Asa retakes control in Chainsaw Man Chapter 182, punching Yoru and revealing her own painful memory of her mother’s death due to her clumsiness.

Denji, moved, asks how she coped, and Asa admits she hasn’t, but recalls that Chainsaw Man gave her hope. Suddenly, Denji coughs up the Snow Devil’s head, enveloping the world in snow, which seems to trigger a flashback of Aki and Power as Chainsaw Man Chapter 182 ends.

For more updates from the Chainsaw Man manga, keep up with Pinkvilla.

*The release dates and times provided are accurate at the time of writing and are subject to change at the discretion of the creators.

title: Watch: Kartik Aaryan's 'Bejod' Surprise For Fans At Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 Screening In Varanasi
text:
Basking in immense love from fans for his latest release Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, Kartik Aaryan is currently in Varanasi. The actor is in the city as a part of his promotional activities for the horror click. He took part in the revered Ganga Aarti ceremony, followed by visiting theatres to surprise fans amid the film screening. Kartik seemingly had a blast during one such visit as he also posted a clip on social media, giving us a peek into the joyous time he shared with his fans.
In the clip, Kartik Aaryan is seen entering the theatre hall, leaving fans buzzing with excitement as they all cheer for the actor, showcasing their love and support. Fans are also seen chanting Har Har Mahadev in a heartwarming gesture, with the actor also joining them for the same. As the video progresses, we can also see Kartik asking for a review of his latest release as he questions, “Thank you so much. Aap film dekh rahein hain. Kaisi lagi film?”
In response, one of them screamed saying, “Bahot achi, bahot bejod,” with others joining him to add, “Garda macha diya aapne. Jalwa.” As the actor headed for the exit at the end of the clip, fans shouted, “Rooh Baba Ki Jai.”
Moved by the love and appreciation from the audience in theatres, Kartik Aaryan, in his caption, wrote, “A visit to Remember !! kya bejod response tha. Har Har Mahadev. Tuesday Night Houseful theatre in Banaras.” In Varanasi for promotions, the actor wore a simple white shirt and jeans, making a case for simple yet stylish looks.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by KARTIK AARYAN (@kartikaaryan)

Speaking of Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, the Anees Bazmee directorial features Kartik as Rooh baba. He shares the screen space with Madhuri Dixit Nene, Vidya Balan and Triptii Dimri for added intrigue to the cast. A third installment in the Bhool Bhulaiyaa franchise, Kartik’s latest release is packed with fun, horror and thrilling elements, making for an entertaining watch.
Additionally, it is competing at the box office against Rohit Shetty’s Singham Again. Featuring a star-studded cast including Deepika Padukone, Ajay Devgn, Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor Khan and Tiger Shroff, the film opened to a mixed response from fans and critics alike.

title: On 53rd Birthday, Tabu Reflects On Sister Farah Naaz’s Role In Shaping Her Career
text:
Tabu, one of the most talented and versatile actresses of Indian cinema, turns 53 today. She has impressed audiences with her impeccable on-screen acting prowess in the films Life of Pi, Haider, Drishyam, etc. Do you know her sister, actress Farah Naaz’s success in Bollywood motivated her to act in films? Yes, that’s right. The actress had talked about it in an exclusive interview with a media portal. Tabu said that she was very fond of Hyderabad and her school. Due to this reason, she stayed there with her aunt for three years. Till that time, Tabu said that her sister (actress Farah Naaz) had acted in many films and had become a top-notch star. The Life of Pi actress said it is because of Farah Naaz, her interest in films increased. She also left no stone unturned in making a career in acting.
Tabu’s debut in acting was marred with unsuccessful films at the start. One of her films, Prem, directed by Satish Kaushik, starring Sanjay Kapoor in the lead flopped at the box office. According to the reports, it took the producer Boney Kapoor 8 years to produce the film. Despite the failure of Prem, Tabu’s performance was noted and she became famous as an actress. After that, there was no turning backwards. She managed to amass a massive fan base with her acting in the films Chandni Bar, Hera Pheri, etc.
Tabu will next play an important role in the Dune’s prequel, Dune: Prophecy, an American TV series. She will play Sister Francesca in this prequel series to the 2021 film Dune. Based on Brian Herbert and Kevin J. Anderson’s novel, this series will premiere on Jio Cinema in India on November 17, 2024. This series stars an ensemble star cast of Emily Watson, Olivia Williams, Travis Fimmel, Jodhi May and others in important roles. Cunning Hand, HBO Max and Legendary Television have backed this series.
On the work front, Tabu will next play an important role in the film De De Pyaar De 2, directed by Anshul Sharma. This film is expected to be released on May 1, 2025.
summary: Tabu's career in acting was marred with unsuccessful films in the beginning.

title: Harry Potter Star Matthew Lewis Reveals How Cast Handled Childhood Stardom
text:
Imagine being a kid and stepping into a world filled with magic, fame and spells — a dream for many, but a real-life experience for Harry Potter star Matthew Lewis. Now 35, the actor who brought Neville Longbottom to life reflected on why he and his co-stars including Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint, managed to escape the fate of many child stars who struggle as adults. Spoiler alert: it wasn’t just because they had wands and cloaks. Recently, in a Q&A session at Rhode Island Comic Con on November 3, Lewis shared that it was the cast’s strong friendships that kept them grounded, even with the immense fame that came with the wizarding world.
While discussing his decade-long journey on the Harry Potter set, Lewis didn’t hold back on the ups and downs they faced as young actors transitioning into adulthood. “We’re very good at hiding all of those stories,” he joked, but then he got a bit more serious about the “tricky” reality of growing up in the industry.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Matthew Lewis (@mattdavelewis)

Lewis revealed that stepping out of the Harry Potter bubble was daunting. He wasn’t entirely sure how he’d fit in as an adult actor. “There was absolutely a lot of trepidation,” he said, adding that he worried if he’d be able to make it in the wider acting world. He admitted, “After 10 years in Harry Potter, I was ready to do something else and also was not keen to do anything that was going to lead to multiple series.”
But it wasn’t all magic and charm spells. Lewis explained that he and his castmates shared a unique bond that kept them sane amid the chaos of child stardom. He believes their strong friendship helped them avoid the pitfalls that so often ensnare young actors. “One of the questions that was asked earlier about the pitfalls of being a child actor that we seem to have avoided, I would posit that a large degree of that was because we were all there together,” he said.
Unlike many young actors who feel the weight of carrying a movie alone, Lewis and his co-stars had each other to lean on. “A lot of the fears that we had were all shared,” he explained. The tight-knit Harry Potter cast experienced both the highs and the challenges of their journey together, creating an unbreakable bond. Lewis added that only they could understand what each other had gone through, “Anyone else in the world will never be able to understand really what we went through and how it affected our personal lives except each other. Working together wasn’t just wonderful, it was lots of fun,” he added.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Harry Potter (@harrypotter)

While some might rewatch the movies or re-read the books, Lewis shared that it’s the friendships, not the story itself, that still hold a place in his heart. 
With Harry Potter set for a reboot on Max as a television series, fans are already curious if we’ll see Lewis return as Neville Longbottom. For now, though, Lewis isn’t in a rush to dive back in. “It’s not something I’m looking at or want to do but would not turn my nose up at,” he shared, noting that playing an adult Neville would be a fresh and intriguing angle.
summary: Unlike many young actors who feel the weight of carrying a movie alone, Matthew Lewis and his co-stars had each other to lean on.
author: News18,Sahas,Yatamanyu Narain

title: Simi Garewal supports Abhishek Bachchan amid divorce rumors with Aishwarya Rai, calls him ‘nicest man in Bollywood’
text:
Simi Garewal recently shared a vintage clip featuring Abhishek Bachchan. In the video, he eloquently spoke about loyalty and commitment in relationships, which took on new significance amid swirling rumors regarding his marriage to Aishwarya Rai. She lauded Abhishek as one of Bollywood’s 'nicest men'. 

Simi Garewal revisited a nostalgic moment from her popular show, Rendezvous with Simi Garewal, by sharing a clip featuring Abhishek Bachchan. In this 2003 interview, the I Want To Talk actor candidly spoke about his views on commitment and loyalty in relationships. 

He expressed his belief in the importance of honoring one’s commitments, stating that while he has no issues with frivolity or having fun, those who make commitments should adhere to them, or refrain from making them altogether.

In the video, he further elaborated on his views about loyalty, emphasizing that a man’s commitment to a woman should remain steadfast, even in complex situations. He expressed his disdain for the stereotype that men are inherently disloyal, asserting that he finds such assumptions unfounded and troubling. Abhishek Bachchan’s insights into loyalty and fidelity highlighted his belief in the importance of honoring one’s commitments in relationships.

Sharing the video, Simi captioned it, “Rendezvous Gems. I think everyone who knows Abhishek personally will agree he is among the nicest men in Bollywood. Good values and innate decency.” 

Farah Khan, the filmmaker, choreographer, and actress, echoed her sentiments in the comments, stating her full agreement, noting that Abhishek is truly one of the nicest people around.

Speculation about Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai's marriage intensified when the Bachchans did not wish Aishwarya on her birthday on social media. The rumors began to circulate during Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding, which the Bachchan family attended as a unit, but Aishwarya and their daughter Aaradhya appeared separately. 

On the professional front, Abhishek Bachchan has an upcoming project titled I Want To Talk, directed by Shoojit Sircar. He also has Be Happy and Housefull 5 in his kitty. The actor was last seen in R Balki's Ghoomer.

She lauded Abhishek as one of Bollywood’s 'nicest men'.

title: Kareena Kapoor and Meghna Gulzar’s film gets THIS Bade Miyan Chote Miyan actor on board after Ayushmann Khurrana exits? Here’s what we know
text:
Just a few months back, it was reported that Ayushmann Khurrana had walked out of Meghna Gulzar’s film starring Kareena Kapoor. It happened because the actor couldn’t fill in the date for the movie. Meanwhile, a recent report has now suggested that Bade Miyan Chote Miyan actor Prithviraj Sukumaran has come on board in place of Khurrana for an important role.

The latest report published in India Today suggests that actor Prithviraj Sukumaran has been finalized for Meghna Gulzar’s next film, which is tentatively titled, Daayra. The director is currently working on a film featuring Kareena Kapoor, and the South star has been signed for an important role. The film is reportedly based on a true and disturbing incident.

A source close to the development informed the publication that the actor will be seen as a cop in the film. "After Ayushmann Khurrana and Sidharth Malhotra exited Daayra due to scheduling conflicts, Prithviraj was approached. He connected with the script and the film's message," the source was quoted as saying.

"His role is essential in driving the narrative, while Kareena's character will show her in a new light, exuding strength, vulnerability, and intuition," the source further added. The shooting of Prithviraj’s first collaboration with Kareena and Meghna is expected to start soon.

An earlier report in Midday revealed that Khurrana couldn’t allot his dates to the film due to the packed second half of 2024. The film is supposed to go on floors by the end of the year and will clash with the actor’s music tour and his cinematic ventures.

Notably, our source reflecting on the film’s subject earlier this year shared that after Talvar, it would be a hard-hitting project that Meghna had researched through the last few years. She also has strong source material in place for her screenplay.

On the work front, Prithviraj’s last Bollywood film was Ali Abbas Zafar’s Bade Miyan Chote Miyan alongside Akshay Kumar and Tiger Shroff. Meanwhile, Meghna’s last directorial was Sam Bahadur led by Vicky Kaushal and Kareena Kapoor is currently enjoying the release of Rohit Shetty’s Singham Again led by Ajay Devgn alongside Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Tiger Shroff, Jackie Shroff and Arjun Kapoor.

title: Festive Season Tips: Nutritionist Reveals Her Festive Favourites
text:
Diwali, the festival of love, light, and sweetness, is a time for celebration filled with joy and delicious treats. While this festive season encourages indulgence, it can also pose challenges for those trying to maintain healthy habits. Nutritionist Lovneet Batra offers a practical approach to enjoying Diwali without compromising on health. In her recent Instagram video, she answers 20 questions, sharing tips on how to celebrate while staying fit. Let's dive into her insights on balancing festive enjoyment with wellness.
Lovneet Batra kicks off her video by addressing a fundamental question: “How many days is Diwali celebrated for?” She confirms that the festival spans five days. As she navigates through various questions, she shares her personal preferences, choosing a bustling Diwali market over a candle-making workshop and opting for diyas instead of rangoli. She expresses her love for hosting parties rather than attending them, enjoys playing karaoke over cards, and favours the charm of fairy lights over the noise of fireworks. In a nod to sustainable gifting, she suggests plants as the perfect gift idea for the season.
When asked about her favourite activities, Lovneet confidently states, “Cook a meal,” stressing on her passion for preparing delicious and healthy dishes.


















View this post on Instagram


































A post shared by Lovneet Batra (@lovneetb)




Lovneet Batra also mentions that dates are a sugar substitute for making homemade mithai. Then, she chose chia seeds over flax seeds and vegetable juices over smoothies. She shares that she never had matcha, so she opts for green tea. She also adds, “If I'll have to pick, then I will pick Jalebi. Small jalebis.” Answering, “Favourite sweet during the festival,” she says, “If it's sweets, homemade kheer.”

She also reveals that she would rather work out than to skip it due to the festive season. However, she mentions, “I don't do calorie maths, I focus on quality ingredients.” Finally, she gives a tip to reduce bloating this season, and shares, “Sip on more fluids,” which is indeed reasonably necessary.

What do you think about Lovneet Batra's version of spending the festive time? Let us know in the comments below.

Disclaimer: This content including advice provides generic information only. It is in no way a substitute for a qualified medical opinion. Always consult a specialist or your own doctor for more information. NDTV does not claim responsibility for this information.
summary: Ahead of Diwali 2024, Nutritionist Lovneet Batra has shared a video answering 20 questions on how she enjoys the festive season.
author: Doctorndtv

title: Kangana Ranaut Celebrates Bhai Dooj, Prays For ‘Dignity, Pride, Well-Being’ Of Her Brothers
text:
Bhai Dooj, falling two days after Diwali, is celebrated across India. This auspicious event celebrates the bond between brothers and sisters, with the latter applying tilak to the former and praying for their wellbeing. Many well-known personalities from Bollywood have also joined in the celebrations, sharing heartfelt messages and images with their siblings on social media. Among others, Kangana Ranaut celebrated Bhai Dooj with her brothers as well. She shared the significance of the auspicious occasion on social media.
Kangana shared a picture of herself performing the rituals with her brothers Aksht and Karan. In the caption, she wrote, “Do you know that #bhaidooj is a festival where sisters vow to protect the dignity, pride and overall well-being of their brothers?” The actress was holding the puja thali while feeding sweets to her brother. She was dressed in a stunning pastel green suit for the occasion while her brothers were sporting winter jackets. 
Kangana Ranaut also celebrated Diwali with her family and uploaded photos from her festivities on Instagram. Kangana wore a pink saree as she celebrated the occasion at her home. In the video, the actress is plucking flowers and transforming them into a garland, making rangolis and even preparing jalebis. Kangana’s family members also appear in the clip, helping her during the festivities. The actress also lit diyas and enjoyed with several firecrackers.

The actress posted several glimpses from the tour on social media with the caption, “Our children are named after great warriors, I love to explore the history of Bharat and its hot-blooded great Kshatriya warriors. Also nice to have a family vacation in our favourite place Rajasthan.” During their visit, the family explored the city’s most renowned desserts. title: From Kareena Kapoor Khan to Sonali Bendre, celebs extend birthday wishes to Tabu
text: Bollywood actor Tabu, known for her roles in films like ‘Border’, ‘Biwi No. 1’, and ‘Hum Saath-Saath Hain’, is celebrating her birthday today, with several celebrities extending their warm birthday wishes on social media.Taking to Instagram stories, Kareena Kapoor Khan shared a stunning photo of Tabu and wrote, “Geeetuuu happy birthday. Sending you love always.” Sonali Bendre, who was seen along with Tabu in ‘Hum Saath Saath Hain’, posted a still from the movie, and wrote a special birthday wish for her.She wrote in the caption, “Happy birthday @tabutiful Sunshine and love your way!”Rhea Kapoor shared Tabu’s photo and wrote, “Happy birthday to the head of cabin crew. Happy birthday Tabu.”Talking about the stunning actor’s work front, Tabu has established her name in Bollywood because of her versatile and natural acting talent. She has received numerous awards including two National Film Awards, seven Filmfare Awards (including a record five Critics’ Awards for Best Actress), and two Filmfare Awards South. She has also been honoured with Padma Shri. She acted in movies such as ‘Virasat’, ‘Hu Tu Tu’, and ‘Astitva’.Recently, Tabu made headlines with her stylish appearance at the New York premiere of her upcoming series ‘Dune: Prophecy’. She stunned in a custom black couture gown by Indian designers Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla. Tabu treated fans with pictures of herself from the premiere.Tabu’s ensemble was a reinvention of the traditional Angrakha. The couture showcases the revival of Abu Sandeep’s iconic ‘Crushed Silk’ collection. Crafted from pure Khadi silk, it boasts a crushed texture achieved through a signature artisanal technique, perfected over thirty-eight years ago.In Dune: Prophecy, a prequel series set 10,000 years before the Dune films, this new series delves into the origins of the enigmatic Bene Gesserit sisterhood, emerging in the aftermath of the Butlerian Jihad.Tabu will be seen playing the pivotal role of Sister Francesca in the series.The series will explore how the Bene Gesserit, a formidable sisterhood integral to the ‘Dune’ narrative, began to assert its influence across the galaxy.Tabu, who is making her Hollywood debut, stars alongside actresses Emily Watson and Olivia Williams, who portray sisters from the notorious Harkonnen family.Their characters play crucial roles in the formation of the Bene Gesserit, promising to add depth to the series.The series introduces a new array of characters alongside familiar names from the ‘Dune’ legacy, including Emperor Javicco Corrino, portrayed by Mark Strong, and Princess Ynez.The diverse cast also features Faoileann Cunningham, Aoife Hinds, and Jade Anouka, among others, all contributing to the emerging narrative of the sisterhood.Despite some initial scepticism about a ‘Dune’ spin-off, the buzz surrounding the trailer has ignited considerable excitement among fans.
summary: The News Mill
author: ANI

title: 7 heartwarming movies on Netflix for beginners exploring Bollywood
text:
Are you new to Bollywood movies, or do you have a friend who is unfamiliar with Hindi cinema but wants to discover it? Then you’re at the perfect place, as this piece has a list of beginner-friendly titles available on Netflix. These include some classics as well as some recent films that have a feel-good vibe. Check out these heartwarming movies on Netflix for beginners exploring Bollywood.

7 heartwarming movies on Netflix to add to your watchlist to discover the magic of Bollywood:

1. Laapataa Ladies
tF1JN2pT_sM
 Running Time: 2 hours 2 mins
 IMDb Rating: 8.4/10
 Movie Genre: Comedy/Drama
 Movie Star Cast: Nitanshi Goel, Pratibha Ranta, Sparsh Shrivastava, Chhaya Kadam, Ravi Kishan
 Director: Kiran Rao
 Writer: Sneha Desai, Divyanidhi Sharma, Biplab Goswami
 Year of release: 2024

Laapataa Ladies is one of the latest Bollywood movies on Netflix. The film is about two brides who get exchanged on a train. It follows their journey of self-discovery. Laapataa Ladies has received a lot of appreciation from the critics and the audience. The comedy-drama is even India’s official entry to the 97th Academy Awards. Thus, it makes for a good choice if you’re unfamiliar with Hindi cinema.

2. Dear Zindagi
5DkO7ksXY8E
 Running Time: 2 hours 29 mins
 IMDb Rating: 7.4/10
 Movie Genre: Drama
 Movie Star Cast: Alia Bhatt, Shah Rukh Khan, Ira Dubey, Rohit Saraf, Kunal Kapoor, Ali Zafar
 Director: Gauri Shinde
 Writer: Gauri Shinde
 Year of release: 2016

Dear Zindagi is another heartwarming movie on Netflix. It is about a young girl, Kaira, who is facing struggles in her personal and professional lives. Still dealing with childhood trauma, she decides to take the help of a psychologist. Dr. Jug’s life lessons promise to touch your hearts, and there is no better way to start exploring Bollywood movies than with Dear Zindagi.

3. Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
Rbp2XUSeUNE
 Running Time: 2 hours 40 mins
 IMDb Rating: 7.2/10
 Movie Genre: Romance/Comedy/Drama
 Movie Star Cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Kalki Koechlin, Aditya Roy Kapur
 Director: Ayan Mukerji
 Writer: Ayan Mukerji, Hussain Dalal
 Year of release: 2013

Another perfect beginner-friendly Bollywood movie is Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani. This cult classic has everything from romance to drama, humor, music, and emotions. The film is about Naina, a studious girl going on a life-changing trip and finding love in Bunny, who has time only for his career.

4. Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
ifIBOKCfjVs
 Running Time: 2 hours 33 mins
 IMDb Rating: 8.2/10
 Movie Genre: Adventure Drama/Romance
 Movie Star Cast: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol, Katrina Kaif, Kalki Koechlin
 Director: Zoya Akhtar
 Writer: Zoya Akhtar, Reema Kagti, Farhan Akhtar
 Year of release: 2011

Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara, like Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, is one of the most popular Bollywood movies. It is a complete package as the story unfolds around three friends, who travel to Spain for a bachelor trip. The film is a celebration of friendship and will also give you major wanderlust goals.

5. Wake Up Sid 
Ngimy3GpHS0
 Running Time: 2 hours 12 mins
 IMDb Rating: 7.6/10
 Movie Genre: Romance/Comedy
 Movie Star Cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Konkona Sensharma, Anupam Kher, Supriya Pathak
 Director: Ayan Mukerji
 Writer: Ayan Mukerji, Niranjan Iyengar

When on the lookout for movies on Netflix to introduce your friend to Bollywood, Wake Up Sid is another excellent choice. It is a coming-of-age story about Sid, a spoiled guy, who learns the value of responsibility from Aisha, the new girl in Mumbai. Fans are mesmerized to this date with the way their friendship gradually turned into love.

6. Om Shanti Om
9oeGoQGt7Ao

 IMDb Rating: 6.7/10

Om Shanti Om is a quintessential Hindi movie that also goes behind the scenes of the industry. One of the biggest reasons to watch this film is Shah Rukh Khan, who is among the most popular celebrities in India and across the world. He plays the role of Om, who is reincarnated so he can take revenge. The song Deewangi Deewangi, which features a number of Bollywood stars, is like the cherry on top.

7. Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
7uY1JbWZKPA

Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham is another movie on Netflix that will take the viewer on an emotional ride. It stars the iconic onscreen jodi of Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol, along with a number of famous Indian actors. The movie explores the dynamics of the Raichand family and has a heartwarming climax with a sweet reunion. K3G is an evergreen film, which will be a perfect choice if you’re new to Hindi cinema.

title: Makers Reveal Title Of Kunchacko Boban’s Next On His Birthday
text:
Kunchacko Boban, one of the prominent figures in Malayalam cinema, is set to appear in some highly anticipated releases. To mark the actor’s 48th birthday on November 2, the title of one of his upcoming movies was unveiled in a social media post, adding to fans’ excitement.
On their official Instagram handles, the filmmakers shared a joint post announcing the title in celebration of Kunchacko Boban’s birthday. The caption read, “Happy Birthday Dear Kunchacko Boban. Here Is The Official Title Look Poster Of Our Movie #OruDuroohaSaahacharyathil.” The poster features the title’s font in the shape of a handgun, set against a blue-painted wooden door.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Oru Durooha Saahacharyathil (@oru_durooha_saahacharyathil)

Oru Durooha Saahacharyathil is directed by Ratheesh Balakrishnan Poduval and stars Kunchacko Boban, Dileesh Pothan, Sajin Gopu, and Chidambaram in significant roles. The film is produced by Listin Stephen and Kunchacko Boban under the Magic Frames and Udaya Pictures banners, with music by Dawn Vincent, cinematography by Arjun Sethu, and editing by Manoj Kannoth.
Speaking to a media outlet, the director revealed that the film is a “psychological comedy” and aims to offer something fresh. The director and Kunchacko Boban previously collaborated on Nna Thaan Case Kodu, released in 2022. That film also featured actors such as Gayathrie Shankar, Rajesh Madhavan, and P P Kunhikrishnan. Produced by Santhosh T Kuruvilla, Kunchacko Boban, and Sheril Rachel Santhosh under the STK Frames, Kunchacko Boban Productions, and Udaya Pictures banners, the film’s music was also composed by Dawn Vincent. Reports suggest it was both a critical and commercial success, grossing over Rs 50,000 crore at the box office since its release on August 11, 2022.
summary: Oru Durooha Saahacharyathil is directed by Ratheesh Balakrishnan Poduval and stars Kunchacko Boban, Dileesh Pothan, Sajin Gopu, and Chidambaram in significant roles.
author: Entertainment Bureau,News18,Sahas

title: Reese Witherspoon’s Daughter Ava Phillippe Posts A Video Acting Out Scene From Matilda For Halloween
text:
Ava Phillippe surely made us all nostalgic when she shared a clip on social media recreating the 1996 film, Matilda’s short scene. One thing is for certain she surely knows how to keep her followers entertained by sharing such adorable posts.

Reese Witherspoon’s daughter, who she shares with ex- Ryan Phillippe, took to her Instagram to post a video which also featured her friend, Jaden Sanders. Both individuals recreated the scene for the hit film.

Sanders acted out first by lip-syncing, “Thanks for not telling.” She played Lavender from the venture. Then Ava took over and mimed, “Best friends don’t tell.” Resting their heads together, they smiled while looking at the camera as the video ended.

She captioned the video with, “BEST FRIENDS DON'T TELL #happynovember2nd.” Along with cutely acting out in the clip, they also appeared adorable. Ava rocked in a denim dress with a puffed-sleeved white shirt underneath and topped up the look with a red bow. Her friend, Sanders donned a blue denim dungaree along with spectacles. She styled her hair in a braids and bun.

 Additionally, Ava shared one more video on the aforementioned platform, where she mimed the iconic lines from the 1996 movie. She captioned it with, “#Matilda is now 25 & loves feminist literature.”

 Ava shared clips on TikTok of her looking radiant while dressed up as the titular character, Matilda. She also shared a video of her and Sanders showing off moves to reveal their ensembles, per People magazine.

She penned the captioned, “Me: 'Ugh I died my hair and now we can't be Cher and Dionne.' @Jaden Sanders: 'AP -I have an idea.'" Along with sharing creative clips on social media, Ava also makes fashion statements by donning elegant and beautiful dresses.

Along with her, the Big Little Lies actress also has a 21-year-old son, Deacon, who she birthed with Phillipe. In October, he celebrated his 21st birthday. The actress shared a wholesome post dedicated to him on social media.

Witherspoon also has a son apart from Ava and the 21-year-old. The actress shares him with her former partner Jim Toth. They have named him, Tennesse James Toth.

title: Alappuzha couple win Ironman 70.3 title
text:
A couple from Alappuzha have won title at Ironman 70.3, a triathlon championship, at Goa recently. Rupesh S., a dentist, and his wife, Susheela S. Pai, have won the prize in the mixed team relay event.

The Ironman 70.3, also known as Half Ironman, comprised 1.9-km swim, 90-km cycling and 21.1-km run. While Rupesh completed swim and cycling, Ms. Pai completed the run. The couple finished the triathlon in seven hours and 20 minutes as against the time limit of eight hours and thirty minutes.

Their children - Suresh R. Rao and Arush R. Rao - won titles at the Ironkids Goa triathlon.

In September this year, Dr. Rupesh won his third Ironman title with a win at the long-distance triathlon event held in Italy. In the event held in the Emilia-Romagna region, he completed a 2.4-mile (3.86-km) swim in the sea, a 112-mile (180.25-km) cycling, and a 26.22-mile (42.2-km) run in 14 hours and 13 minutes as against the time limit of 16 hours to complete the race.

Previously, he won Ironman titles at Tallinn in Estonia in 2022 and Kalmar in Sweden in 2023. Before competing in Ironman, he won Ironman 70.3 titles at Bintan in Indonesia in 2019, Dubai and Goa in 2022.
summary: Couple is treated as plural- TJ
author: The Hindu Bureau

title: When Yash found Ranbir Kapoor ‘a little distracted’ in his films, revealed why he ‘never really liked’ Ranveer Singh’s performances
text:
Yash is one such actor who has completely justified the tag of being a pan-India heartthrob. Known for his extremely humble nature, Yash once made some critical comments about Bollywood leads Ranbir Kapoor and Ranveer Singh in terms of their performances on screen.

In one of his older interviews from 2018 with ETV Bharat Films and TV, Yash made some interesting remarks about two of his arch colleagues, Ranveer Singh and Ranbir Kapoor. Talking about Ranveer, Yash cited how he never really liked his films up until the actor delivered blockbuster successes with the filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali.

Yash said, "Ranveer Singh, I never used to like his work initially, but I don’t know how he is looking too good. His film with Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Bajirao Mastani—from then I started liking him. And he is stunning in Padmavat; he is just amazing."

Moving on, Yash also spoke about Ranbir Kapoor and shared that he had watched the latter’s film Sanju, among other projects of his. However, he did not forget to express that he finds the Barfi actor distracted.

The KGF actor said, “Ranbir Kapoor, I saw him in Sanju. I saw a lot of his work; he was too good. I don’t know; off late I felt he was a little distracted, but in Sanju he was too good.”

Yash also opened up about the actors he has loved in Bollywood. He started with legendary stars like Amitabh Bachchan and Shah Rukh Khan and tagged them as his all-time favorites.

Over the years, Yash has strived to maintain cordial equations with many Bollywood stars.

On the work front, Yash is gearing up for his next release, Toxic: A Fairytale for Grown Ups and Ramayan.

title: When Aishwarya Rai Spoke About Overcoming Challenges With Abhishek Bachchan: ‘If You Can Shut The Chapter Today…’
text:
Rumors about the marriage of Bollywood stars Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan have been circulating, especially after neither Abhishek nor other Bachchan family members publicly wished Aishwarya on her 51st birthday on November 1. While fans from around the world showered Aishwarya with birthday love, her father-in-law, Amitabh Bachchan, also refrained from his usual practice of marking special occasions with heartfelt blog posts, further fueling speculation.
Amid these ongoing rumors, an old interview with Aishwarya has resurfaced, where she opened up about her relationship with Abhishek and the crucial role of communication. “There’s a lot of adjustment, a lot of give and take. There will be agreements and disagreements. But it’s important to keep the communication going. That’s something I’ve always believed in,” she told Filmfare.
She continued, “Abhishek has been wonderful to respect that. Communication is extremely important in a relationship. Doesn’t it all start with friendship? What’s friendship all about? I’m not one of those who say, ‘Okay shut it for today and don’t take it to tomorrow.’ If it needs to go to tomorrow, then it’ll go to tomorrow. And if you can shut the chapter today, great! But neither fit into a rule book. There’s no finality in looking at each day. You have to be open-minded about how you share your time together. It also means respecting and being sensitive to your partner,” she added.
On November 1, fans were quick to observe the silence from Amitabh Bachchan, Abhishek Bachchan, and Shweta Bachchan, as none publicly acknowledged Aishwarya’s birthday. The lack of any visible celebration led to online discussions and left some fans puzzled by the apparent change.
On Reddit, fans unearthed old tweets from Amitabh Bachchan that highlighted a very different tone in previous years. In 2010, Amitabh expressed gratitude to fans for their wishes for Aishwarya, sharing, “T172 -First things first … thank you all for wishing Aishwarya on her birthday !! Have passed it on to her.. she thanks all … love.” Another tweet mentioned a family dinner celebrating her birthday: “T171 -….family dinner at Chinese in Taj where function was held … and brought in Aishwarya Birthday ..good feel about the day..”
The Bachchan family’s silence has only intensified speculation about possible marital issues between Aishwarya and Abhishek, who have been married for 17 years and are parents to Aaradhya Bachchan. The gossip started earlier this year when Aishwarya attended the Ambani wedding without Abhishek, making an entrance with their daughter, Aaradhya. Adding fuel to the fire, Abhishek recently liked a social media post about divorce, which caught fans’ attention.
Aishwarya and Abhishek’s relationship blossomed from friendship while working on films like Dhai Akshar Prem Ke (2000) and Kuch Naa Kaho (2003), but romance truly developed during the filming of Umrao Jaan in 2005-2006. The couple tied the knot on April 20, 2007, in a grand wedding ceremony. Following this, they welcomed their daughter Aaradhya in 2011.
summary: Rumors surrounding the marriage of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan have intensified after the Bachchan family remained silent on Aishwarya's 51st birthday.
author: News18,Yatamanyu Narain

title: Tabu Birthday: Ajay Devgn shares what happens when you don't wish actress on her big day; Kareena Kapoor Khan sends birthday love to her Crew co-star
text:
On November 4, 2024, Tabu turned 53. On the actress’s big day, several Bollywood actors took to social media to wish her well. Kareena Kapoor Khan, Ajay Devgn, Sonali Bendre, Rakul Preet Singh, and others showered birthday love on her.

Taking to his Instagram stories, Ajay Devgn dropped a picture of Tabu from their movie Drishyam. Penning a sweet and funny note for her, he wrote, “When you don’t wish Tabu on her birthday. Atta Tabu chi satakliii! Happy Birthday @tabutiful.”

Kareena Kapoor Khan wished her Crew co-star on her 53rd birthday. In her thoughtful note, she said, “Geetuuuu happy birthday sending you love always.” Senior star Urmila Matondkar shared a picture with the birthday girl from an event. Wishing her well, she wrote, “Happy wala birthday dear.”

Take a look:
Sonali Bendre also took to her social media and dropped an old picture from their movie, Hum Saath Saath Hain. Wishing Tabu, she wrote, “Happy Birthday @tabutiful. Sunshine and love your way!” Rakul Preet Singh, who shared the screen with Tabu in the movie De De Pyaar De wished luck to the senior actor.

In her heartfelt note, Singh divulged, “Happy Birthday, Tabu ma’am! Just always be your amazing stunning self. You know I love you and may your birthday be the start of a year filled with good luck, good health, and all the happiness in the world.” Meanwhile, on the work front, the Indian actress is going global, yet again, with her upcoming TV series, Dune: Prophecy.

In an exclusive statement to Pinkvilla, Tabu expressed that she is thrilled to be a part of the massive global franchise and to be working with some of the most brilliant creators, actors, and crew in the industry. “I am looking forward to bringing the show to the homes and hearts of the audience through JioCinema.”

For the unknown, Dune: Prophecy is the prequel to the 2021 film Dune. Developed by Diane Ademu-John and Alison Schapker, it also stars Mark Strong, Sarah-Sofie Boussnina, Josh Heuston, Chloe Lea, Jade Anouka, Faoileann Cunningham, Edward Davis, Aoife Hinds, Chris Mason, and Shalom Brune-Franklin among others. The series is scheduled to premiere on November 17, 2024.
